I normally use a clay dry shampoo, which I like better, but this gets the job done. I normally only wash my hair every three days (unless I sweat) and no one knows unless tell them. Dry shampoo takes away the greese and give your hair lift. It is damaging to your hair to wash it every day so this is a good alternative. This works almost as good as my normal clay dry shampoo. It is defianately worth it if you like dry shampoo and are traveling. Small size is perfect for those long international flights.

The green nail polish looked very bright and opaque on amazon. I thought it would be cute under OPI's black shatter. So I bought it and it turned out looking like marker on my nails. I had to layer like 4 or 5 coats and it still wasn't the true color. A bit disappointing and not very opaque. The color isn't a bright once you do 4 or 5 coats but it doesn't look as much like marker.

I would normally give this lotion 5 stars but for two things I can't. For one it's to greasy and secondly the aroma or should I say smell is not pleasant at all. Otherwise it does a good job of tanning, you just have to deal with those flaws. JMHO

I'm only giving this item 3 stars because the night light does not work. My contractor installed it for me; however, as far as the hair dryer itself ggoes, I'd give it 5 stars! Every woman should have this one in her bathroom, It's handy, neat because of the cord storage, snd really works fine. I'm hoping by the time I have my other bath done, it will be made in beige. I like to co-ordinate my colors.

I'm a little disappointed, Andis.I bought this dryer for trips, and it does what it needs to do - it folds up, it dries my hair. But it's rather loud, and the cord isn't entirely retractable, and it's frankly a little underpowered - it's slow. Is it fine for trips? Yes. But I've used much better, stronger dryers that cost far less. Be aware: You're paying for the label, not the performance. ("Ceramic" - oh lord, that is truly up there with "ionic" in the pantheon of absurd "just paint it on there and add another zero to the price" labels!) I don't hate it, but I wouldn't buy it again.

It's hard to know if this really works, but it certainly isn't hurting. I will keep using it and see. There really isn't a good clinical trial that I can present, but all I can say is that no one has said, "What is that stink?" Other than that, it does seem people react better to me, but how much of that is real I just can't quantify.

Nice nail color however chips by day 6.. Right price but overpriced for shipping. I purchased another nail color from them at the same time. I got two shipping charges when both nailpollishes come in the same $3 shipping/us postage paid envelope ! I paid $12 in shipping. What a rip off and especially when both polishes chip in less than a week! Color is nice is only thing that is good.. Natural without looking white

The smart clips that came with these rollers are not in the least bit user friendly. I found them impossible to use. The rollers themselves do heat up very quickly, but they get too hot. I tried to use the smart clips and the new rollers for a week but then gave up. I returned to my very old Conair Travel set of 5 Jumbo rollers with my old fashioned metal clips. My new rollers have disappeared into the cabinet underneath my wash basin!

I found the Revlon Eyelash Curler a little hard to use, but once I figured it out, the results were very nice. If a friend was in the market for an eyelash curler, I'd recommend this one. It gives good results and is easy to use, once I figured it out.

I actually liked the make-up, but I started breaking out and my face would sweat a lot and burn. Turns out I am allergic to bismuth oxychloride like many other people are. Also, this ingredient makes your face look more shiny, thus the need for the mineral veil. There are many other mineral make-ups out there that do not contain bismuth oxychloride. I can still use the eyeshadows and eyeliner.
My box did not have the derma seal sticker which makes me very uncomfortable in the validity of this item...

This is my personal fragrance. I love this perfume, its so light and refreshing and its lasts long on you. I always get complements on this fragrance. I will always buy atleast two bottles and keep it so i will never run out of it. You will definitely enjoy this scent.

I received this product in the mail today and was quite disappointed with the size of the item. It's very tiny for the semi-expensive price of it. Also, it does not really smell much like banana. My boyfriend and I both agreed that it smells more accurately like Lemon PEZ. However, one good thing about this is that it works great in the shower. It creates a nice, rich lather on a loofah and leaves a fresh scent, even after washing it off. I will probably not purchase this item again but it's alright.

Not sure why this has happened but my orignial and smaller bottle of Nixon 3 Cleanser (10.0 fl. oz)was made in the U.S.A. while this larger (33.8 fl. oz.) size is made in Mexico.The small bottle's first 5 ingredients: water, tea-lauryl sulfate, sodium laureth sulfate, hydroxypropyltrimonium honey, cocoamido-propyl betaine.Now it is has changed to: water, sodium laureth sulfate, sodium lauryl sulfate, citric acid, sodium citrate.I'm not a chemist but, it certainly appears to be less natural without the tea and coco ingredients.Changes have been made to the formula structure and I'm not sure if it is a better formula or a cost saving measure.I'll give it try to see if it continues to be useful.

I first purchased this product at a shop in the Caribbean, when I needed a general-use body cream. I loved the scent of this olive oil product, and it is easily absorbed into the skin. I've since switched to another olive oil product, however, due to the parabens and other chemicals found in this body butter. It does not purport to be paraben-free or organic, however, so there's no misrepresentation. It was the creamiest, most nicely scented of the body butters I've tried.
didn't work for the reason i purchased it, keep ants away, but it smells just as nice i remember it did (we used it for mosquito repellant in the south!) product was a good price & arrived promptly.
I was thrilled with the size of the lotion. It was much larger than I anticipated. Love the product. I received it very timely and I quite satisified with the purchase.

I found the consistency of the product to be a bit tricky to spread properly. After application, I found it had a blotchy effect. Perhaps it is not meant for my skin type and tone? I'm happy I tried it out, but would not vouch for it to work for everyone.

I used this product purchased from local supermarket and it worked great. I have been making my own hair dye from pure henna and indigo powder and it worked very well, except for the preparation of the mix, which is very time-comsuming and also I had to leave it on my hair for at least 4 hours. I don't like commercial hair color because they contain ammonia, peroxide, and PPD.This product is very convenient. No more time-consuming mixing and waiting 12 hours for the mixture to release the dye, no more stuck at home for 4 hours for the dye to work. and it covers the gray better than my own henna. However, the product I purchased from this vendor has LOTS of solid bits in it. I don't know why it's different than the ones I bought from the store which is all liquid cream. It still works fine, but I don't like that it is full of color solid bits, and it stains my counter and floor. I will still use this product but I would try other vendor, or just buy directly from the local store.
Color reminds me of fuschia a deep rich pink. Color goes on smoothly. It is exactly what I was expecting tried the color in a salon prior to buying. I love Essie products

I love pink sugar Aqualina so I ordered it at a good price from Amazon. I noticed by the third day the spray pump was mal-functioning and it does not spray properly. Well, that was a waste of money.Again - the product if working properly is awesome. This was my first and only issue with buying something through Amazon.
DON'T THINK I WILL ORDER AGAIN ONLY BECAUSE IT IS MADE WITH MINERAL OIL I MIX IT WITH MY OTHER OILS FOR NOW

I have thick hair. This product is OK, but I'm not overly impressed. I've tried others and this is definitely better than products you would find at Wal-mart or the grocery store and the price isn't too bad. I feel like it takes forever to straighten my hair with this and it's still not as flat/unfrizzy as I would like it to be. Oh well, it will work for now.
Love the soap. LOVE the box!!! Great presentation and quality. SPEEDY shipping!

I have used Alpha Hydrox Souffle and other Alpha Hydrox products for the last 15 years. It is an incredible product. In the past year it has become unavailable at our local Rite Aid and Walgreens up here in the boonies of upstate NY. I have tried other products, Loreal, Olay, and others and nothing produces results like this product for my skin.I decided to try buying it on line and placed my order. It promptly arrived 4 days later and I ran to the sink to clean my face and start my face routine. When I opened the jar it was nearly empty and so dried out it was not spreadable. I'd say the jar had a half inch of product if lucky. You could see where it had dehydrated back to the glass and just plain dried out and shrunk. This WAS NOT THE FLUFFY SOUFFLE I was used to. I opened the second jar I ordered, same thing!First off, I am wondering if this product is being made any more as it is no longer available in the major chains up here in Northern NY as well as in the greater Boston area. Did I get some dried up old inventory sold off to a schlock vendor? I hope not but it would appear to be. The jars have a serial number that starts with 2005. I called the toll free line of Neuterics listed on the jar and got the classic pick a number routine. I was able to leave a number for them to call me back. If they do and make good on their product I will run to rewrite this review. For now, consider it fabulous product, horrible service, and what good is it if it is a dried up 1/4 filled jar? Don't spend your money here until we know. I am dating this review 04/02/10 and if you don't see my correction for improved customer service, stay away. In this econonomy, who has money to waste?
It has a pleasant raspberry scent after a few minutes of being on your skin
Still excited about the bargain I got! Perfume was in perfect condition and is as good as I had expected, fast shipping. Overall great order!

I've seen these mirrors in hotels or TV and always thought they looked so nice and fancy for a bathroom.When I looked online recently, I was finding them for over $100 and I just couldn't bring myself to buy one. I found this on Amazon and for the price, I couldn't resist.I was afraid it would feel flimsy or cheap, but it wasn't!This was easy to mount and looks and feels fantastic. I use it nearly everyday and I have recommended this to everyone already who sees it in my bathroom!

I love this product! In fact I use it all over since I am so fair, and it gives me a subtle glow without looking orange like most self-tanners make me look. The smell disappears as soon as it dries (which only takes a few minutes).

I really loved the smell of this perfume for the first few hours. It's very sweet, light and lovely in the beginning. After a while it leaves a very strong woody, patchouli scent and I'm left wanting the sweet back.

I normally use a tinted wax to keep my brows in place. It works but it's not as great as I'd like. I've been using this brow mousse after my tinted brow wax and brow powder and it keeps my brows in place much better than just my wax. It also doesn't flake or get goopy.Could the applicator be better? Yes. I usually have to dip the brush back in 3 or 4 times to get enough on my brows. But the product does hold, which is why I bought it.I'd buy it again but would wait for it to be majorly discounted before I did.

I used cuticle clippers, and though I would try these. No comparison. Does a sloppy job, cuts cuticle uneven and hard to get accuracy around the edge of the nail bed. These will have a short life, cause I don't like these.
Love love love this color! Great product & high quality polish! Seems to last longer than most! Love it a lot!

It isn't horribly overwhelming like most women's fragrances. It does have an initial punch, but after a minute or so, it is a light, subtle scent. I usually use 1/2 - one spray and no more than that. It is not necessary.I used this when I was a young teenager, but had a hard time finding it when I moved. My mother recently picked up a bottle for me on a cruise to Jamaica. After using it for the first time in about 16-17 years, I had a huge rush of good memories. I'm happy to have a bottle of this again.
my wife using it or maybe 4 nights. but she complaint the pain on her face drying up and panicked!!!! she immediately brought face lotion or something like that to reverse the effects.

and it's ok. I noticed one little patch of eczema I had is gone and it lathers well. .but it also kinda leaves you skin with that "tight-soap" feeling. . especially if you've used Dove other soaps feel like "soap."..but it was worth a shot.

I was very excited to try this product, it seemed to get rave reviews everywhere I looked, so I was more than happy to pay such an expensive price because I was expecting to see it work.Since I've bought it I've attempted using it a few times in a few different settings, and nothing really seems to occur differently than usual. I even put it on around my boyfriend of two years and he still acted the same way.Much to my disappointment, it really seems like nothing more than an overly expensive nice smelling roll on perfume.It has a nice flowery scent, but as far as the dosage of Pheromones goes, it doesn't seem like enough to give the effect so many people rave about.

I've bought a lot of stuff over the years that claimed to do one thing or another and it ended up being a total waste of money. This however, is some of the best money I've ever spent. I bought one about 10 years ago and I'm still using it. It really does what it says it'll do..removes all makeup without staining the cloth itself. So, it gets used every day and I wash it once a week and it still looks new after 10 years. I paid $10 for it at Bed, Bath & Beyond (it's still the same price there)..so that's $1 a year!I do have to say that with waterproof mascara, it does take a bit more work to get it off, so using just a small drop of face wash or eye makeup remover on your eyes and then washing with this cloth, makes it much easier. Even if it's stubborn and you have to really scrub, this cloth is super soft and very gentle on your skin and eye area. My husband has rosacea, so many types of face wash just irritate him, but he can use this cloth to remove oil, dirt and grit without any reactions to it. I'm still amazed that none of the makeup sticks to the cloth..it rinses completely clean. I never travel anywhere without taking this with me. I think it's just fantastic and that everyone should have one! I just love it! Think of all the money you'd save by not having to buy face wash every few months!

I love these brushes and was delighted to find themon Amazon. But they must have been packed away in a ship holdsomewhere before retailing as I have had two now that had the same strong smell ofmildew in their air output when 1st using them.This has largely dissapated over time but causes me to rate a VERY useful tool with three stars.2nd review - more than a year later! - Just bought two more of these through Amazon.I can't believe the smell that was there in the first order over a year ago is present inmy brand new brushes.VERY STRONG MILDEW smell that infuses my hair/the whole room with that odor.I'm seriously thinking of returning them. Boo hoo! because it's a great tool otherwise.
The on/off switch is inconveniently located on the handle so that when blow drying hair, it is easy to inadvertently switch off the dryer.

This product was pretty. I love flat straight hair and for the first time got it. My hair is puffy and with lots of volume no matter what I do. It damaged my hair a little bit, it looked dull but I put all sorts of leave in condicioners and finishes to stop looking dry and dull. I would buy it again, I have not found any other product that will live my hair so flat and straight.

I did not mind the scent of this lotion and I liked the way my skin looked after application. Unfortunaltely, I started to break out after using it. It may have been the level of vitamin C for me, as I have sensitive , acne prone skin. Now that I have my acne under control (no more dairy, lactose, or casein food products for me), I will try this again.

Got this for 2 year old who started biting nails until bleeding & was desperate for something that we knew wasn't dangerous (read "bordering on poisonous"). The biggest cons are that this stuff is so expensive & over packaged. They should packaged the stuff in one big tube or something to cut down cost & improve useability. The little containers (1.25" diameter & 1" tall) are such a pain to dip fingers into (esp. when you're the parent with fingernails--a bunch ends up getting wasted under my fingernails). The first time we tried it, he didn't seem to be bothered by the taste at all (and it is nasty bitter as I tried it on myelf first & it made me nauseous--we just have an unusual child), so we resorted to taping socks on his hands religiously at night & sometimes during the day if we saw him starting to nibble. So far this technique has been successful. For us, the healing quality of the stuff was more valuable than the prohibitive properties.One con for young children who eat with fingers is that you have to make sure you wash the stuff off really really well before mealtime because it can make everything taste bitter for them. One time my husband forgot to wash his hands really well & let him help cut some fruit for dinner. We all got a taste of the stuff; wasted some good pears too.I was a nailbiter when I was a child & was able to quit cold turkey. This probably wouldv'e worked for me, but I was actually a picky eater unlike our 2 year old who seems to like just about everything which may account for the taste not bothering him.
Not my fav. Very fancy, very expensive...but not great resuts. I wont buy again. It is funny to use...all that foam in your face but once you rinse...same thing before.

I purchased this item online to be sent to an "Angel Tree" type request. I did not actually receive the item, don't know if it was received, or if it is liked. I hope all the above is in the affirmative. However, the purchase process, the communication concerning the purchase and shipment was most excellent. Unless I hear future complaints that those girls are not receiving their gifts, I would not hesitate to repeat this process next gift-giving season.

I prefer this product over almost every other aloe vera gel. Look at the ingredient list. With most products, the first ingredient is water. The only other aloe vera gel I'll buy is Walgreen's house brand because it also lists aloe vera as the first ingredient. Aloe vera gel is very soothing on sunburn, rashes, insect bites, and after shaving. It is also a great daily moisturizer, and will not make your skin break out. I have oily skin and use this even on my face.

I bought this because a lot of other people reviewed it, and were obsessed with it. I definitely like the feeling of the gloss, and the application. BUTTT the gloss stinks. It smells so bad, so when it's on your lips- you can actually smell it! I thought it was just mine ...But I looked it up and others have the same review! I don't know if this is a big deal for others, but it makes a difference to me. $26 is a lot for a lipgloss that stinks!
My wife loves this polish and the color although a bit dark, it looks great on her. Has a nice shimmer to it.

The glitter in this lotion stays in chunks and does not smooth out very well... Not what I was looking for and I will not be wearing this lotion. But it does say glitter lotion so maybe I should have just picked a different product all together. The seller was very nice and It's ok...
I love the product and would recommend it to everyone. It is great and I would purchase this item again.
I was a little disappointed in the Axe body soap I received as it's not the same texture that I use to get when I purchased it in the stores. It seems to be watery which was a disappointment to me.
For me it made my skin red and itchy. I have allergies so for you it might be okay.
There is a soothing effect but I did not see any change in eliminating the redness.

I have bought 2 of these hair dryers because I loved it so much and thought the first one died by a fluke. It wasn't. While it's working this is a great, light-weight, lower noise hair dryer. Unfortunately, after less than a year both started flickering on and off when held at certain angles, and just got worse with continued use. This time I'm not waiting for it to get worse- I'm getting something different.

I have purchased this item in stores for a number of years and found it to be one of the best three-in-one products available. When the Stila convertible color stick arrived by mail the roll-up color was so soft that it broke repeatedly and the product itself created smudge instead of the usual fine line. The liner stick fell out after three days. There was no product in the shadow part, which left only the sponge in working order. I have always liked this Stila product, but will buy it in the stores from now on, where I can examine it to see if it is still the fine product I remember.
I thought that this was a giant waste of money. It did NOTHING for me. Save your money and your time by not buying!

I have Curly/Kinky hair that is transitioning to natural. My hair is thin but highly dense. The true length of my hair is 20 inches total. Of those, 6" are natural, the rest is relaxed. I don't find it difficult to detangle as is, it is just very time consuming. I was in the market for something to reduce the time I spend at it and found this here on amazon. This comb does what it says it does: It glides through the hair and it's easy to use. The problem is that it is too slow, specially in long hair and it often snags your hair without you noticing. If you use a regular comb you can feel the snags as you move along and be more careful, but with this you really can't unless it's a big knot. If only it could cover a larger amount of hair then this would be a higher rated product from my end, but since it can only cover a small amount at a time with since it's small comb, it's a waste of time.Pro:Fast delivery.Great value.Works as described.Lasting Battery.Comes with a dock to make it stand uprightCute designCordlessCon:Very slow.The comb is SO SMALL, covers very little hair at a time.It is also very loud. Though it is just a comb, it is very indiscreet. You do not want to be in a bathroom in a shared house for a long time with something so loud.Overall: Not for little girls or women with massive amounts of hair like me. I have had better results with a big shower comb in a shorter amount of time.Though it works for some, this product was clearly not designed for big curly hair. With that in mind, it would be unreasonable to hold this too hard against Remington, since it is not aimed for this consumer market. However, this review might be helpful for someone with similar hair texture who is also transitioning and looking to purchase this. I will revisit this product again when my hair is fully natural so I can offer a more comprehensive review, but for now it's just "meh".
It was a great opportunity to purchase my Amazing Grace from this vendor. Love love love the price and the product came earlier than expected! Will buy again and again! Thanks!
One of those classic, sophisticated perfumes I have in my collection of perfumes. Lasts longer than most cologne did.
I got this perfume in hopes it would smell good.I was dissappointed it stinks ,smells old or something,would not recommend this product for anyone who wants to smell good.
This is a really good quality kit. The person I bought it for was very pleased. Very roomy and as advertised.

Egyptian Goddess is one of my favorite fragrances. It has a beautiful soft scent that is great for layering. Using the soap together with the oil/perfume is not overpowering. Soap feels and smells like a luxury. Definitely a favorite!

Ok this scent smells ok but come on It's old as dirt. I think its great price wise for children that are starting to wear cologne ages 15-16, but if your a man and you hit on a girl that hasn't been living under a rock the last 15 years she is going to laugh at you and think you are a cheap jerk.Let's break it down ,your 27 yrs old wearing a $30 cologne that Ronald Regan probably wore and try to get a girl thirsty that's wearing a BeBe outfit with $400 heels on ,OMG she will run. The good news is they have hi end stuff that kids and old men in diapers arnt wearing. If you tell that same rooster your wearing $135 Tom Ford or $90 Gucci Guilty you will be getting in that ,trust me. Even you young guys ,you know who's wearing this stuff still? Druggies who steal a bottle from CVS ,then they get all decked out for their NA meeting and bath in this and think their cooler then the bottom side of a pillow. So if you want that smell or wait....Let's say you like cougars , you might get a couple off the strength of Drakkar, I can't lie about that. If you want a 70 year old cougar that probably voted for JFK and fantasized about Regan then this is your stuff,this is all you. Hang out with some druggie that likes 70yr olds DN is you!Bottom line: It has a musk like scent that wears off after a few hours and a great price for the younger crowd,I don't recommend for the established man though and I'm sure its faked a lot too that's another thing you gotta be careful of, especially if your younger and a first time buyer you may think your so cool wearing a well rated cologne from the good folks at Amazon ,meanwhile your spraying a knockoff and have no clue. I would feel terrible if a younger man was hanging with his friends and they bullied him for having a knockoff on especially of a $30 cologne like come on get your stuff together,they'd probably all get a headache then the wearer would be in a depressed state for awhile I don't even wanna think about a guy having that happen with a girl soBottom Line: be careful where you purchase from ,don't get it from China,and I think you'll be ok ,hope this helped

While the products are all as described, the service from Demeter Fragrance Library left much to be desired. I placed an order of 1 full sized cologne spray and two samples. My order came with a free sample which was delightful, except that one sample arrived completely shattered and the sample spray pump did not work. I contacted Demeter Fragrance Library immediately to report the issue and was advised that if I were to return the defective products they would be more than happy to exchange or replace them. I was told I would be refunded for the shipping cost for having to mail my damaged products back to them. This was not the case. While they sent me new products and refunded me for the one item I returned, I was not reimbursed shipping and it took me a week to get a hold of someone at the company who told me that they never reimburse shipping back unless you return the whole order. However, this was not what I was told the first time I called or I would have never sent it back. Now I'm out more for the shipping than I would have been just for the broken perfume sample. The woman I spoke to basically told me that no one could have possibly told me that I would be refunded unless I shipped the whole order back to them because "It's never been that way so I don't know how that could be possible." Way to make your customer feel great. I'll never place an order with them again. Order from an external website if you must.
I've been using this moisturizer for a couple weeks now and I love it! It really evens out the texture and tone of my skin. I recommend trying it!

This is probably in the top 3 perfumes for me that my wife wears consistently. Somebody in another review mentioned that the scent seems to disappear earlier than in the past. I've sort of thought the same thing but at the same time I'm sure there is something to be said for your nose just getting used to certain scents. I'm a fan of finding a few perfumes/colognes you like and then just mixing up what you wear that day and matching it to your mood and activity for the day. This seems to help some in the notice factor for what you smell?????

I read so many great reviews about this product, so I decided to try it. All I can say it's that this product is not for everyone. Instead of making my eczema better, let's just say that it "angered" my skin and didn't stop the itchiness. I had to make more research to help my condition, and what worked for me was Eucerin's Dry Skin Therapy Calming Creme.

I gave this product a three star rating. (at this time)I have not used the product long enough to see significant results. After being sick in 2007 and losing some of my hair as a result of the illness, I was told about these vitamins by a professional at a salon. He informed me that one of his clients had used these vitamins - after her illness - and she was very pleased with regrowth of her hair as well as new hair growth. I will buy them again as I want to give the product at least six months to see if there are adequate results.

I purchased this shampoo because I LOVED the white camellia shampoo.I have coarse and dry hair( Im african american). so after very thorough reviewing of this product I decided that there were more positive reviews than negative reviews. So today I finally used this shampoo and ladies let me tell you this stuff completely strips your hair!! Not an a altogether bad way but in a very squeaky clean but my hair will be tangled type way.I did a hot oil treatment with coconut oil first and then commenced with the shampooing. This does lather sort of but once I finished the first wash I felt that I should wash it for a second time. My hair was clean, my scalp didnt feel as itchy as before I started but my hair felt like it had been washed with detergent. BUT the saving grace for this product is when used with its conditioner (or another very moisturizing one of your choosing) your hair does come out very smooth, a whole lot less coarse, and shiny. Its alot easier to comb and detangle.This is one of those products that must be used with the matching ( and fabulous) conditioner as it suggests or another moisturizing one of your choice.
I love this brand but wasn't overly impressed with this cleanser. Dried out my skin and didn't clear it up.

I put this in my hair, to make it shine as the product name says, but all it did was make my hair look and feel very greasy. My hair was heavy the whole day. I was not happy. Also, the product is advertised as unisex, but it has a very male scent. It doesn't smell good at all. All in all, I wish I hadn't bought it. You should save you money.

First, I love Dr. Ohhira's probiotics and have taken them for years. I expect more from this company that to use horse fat in a product. This is disgusting and unethical. It also makes me reconsider taking the probiotic from this company.I will not support a company that exploits horses. How pathetic that it is being touted as " not tested on animals" when animals are in the product. Shame on Essential Formulas!!

So I saw the infomercial and I was sold!I usually am with any infomercials.I have been using it and it doesnt smell that great, but not bad. Not that its advertised as smelling great.But it is advertised as protecting your hair color and for me it hasnt made a significant difference.Would I buy it again? Not personally. Would I recommended? No.Sorry!
I like using a plain white men's t-shirt much better. $13 for a 7 pack of t shirts instead of $10 for this horrible towel.

This perfume smells citrusy, more on the orange side, and a little sweet.However, this perfume is too simple for me. For example, J'adore is a sophisticated perfume with a hint of citrus, but this perfume is just orangy and sweet, which I liked when I was a mid-teenager (14-18) but not now.If you like a simple perfume that smells citrusy/orangy and a little sweet, then this is a good choice. If you'd rather have a sophisticated than a fun perfume, then I'd suggest J'adore, it is fresh, sophisticated, lady-like and with a hint of citrus.
Bought the waterproof pencil for vacation. Love how it goes on and also the fact that it stays on. I went with the blond and would recommend a lighter color even for darker hair.
So they sell this product in either 1.7 or 3.4. I am curious as to why this one is 3.3? They dont sell it like that anywhere else...so guess a lil confused???

The color is good but it is not as I imaged. I love it anyway.The issue is it is not as thick as the OPI product I have purchased before. It is hard to use. I don't know why. I viewed some review of other OPI product from the same seller. Two reviews say it is not real OPI products. I am not sure about that but it makes me feel bad.If anyone has used it before, pls let me know what you feel. Thanks so much.

...but this stuff WORKS. Holy cow! I've been using it, plus the Daily Regenerating Serum, every morning, then the Eye Serum again plus the Micro Sculpting Serum at night. I started the regimen about two weeks ago, and I can honestly say that I see a difference in my skin. I'm 47 & have the usual signs of aging (though I am lucky, not severe): crow's feet, vertical lines between my eyebrows, some vertical lines around my mouth, plus slight sagging at the jowls. Nothing "scary" but noticeable enough to make me want to address them. I had been using ROC eye & face retinol treatments but they didn't do what these products have been doing, and in a much shorter time. I am truly impressed. The crow's feet are definitely softened, the lip lines are looking better, AND the jowl area is tighter and less "mushy". I have signed up for Subscribe & Save on all of these products, PLUS the Night Resurfacing Elixir and the Micro Sculpting Cream, more for my neck than my face, since I tend to break out with anything heavier than a lotion. I'm sold. :)NOTE: One caveat about the Eye Serum- I noticed that it didn't moisturize as much as I like, so a few minutes after applying the serum, I do put on a thin layer of L'Oreal Age Perfect eye cream (in the little white jar), and the two products combined seem to do the trick for me.

I went through a bottle in two weeks. It takes A LOT of shampoo to distribute throughout your hair. I have long hair and have never had to use such a high volume of shampoo at one time. It took over a tablespoon of shampoo everytime I washed, whereas with other shampoos I used a teaspoon. It smells great and seems of high quality. I love the conditioner that accompanies it.
I'd rather have the Citrus Mint version, but I have never seen it listed anywhere for sale...is there such a fragrance? This is just OK, and rather "common" smelling.

I received this color as a gift and was excited at the bright color. When I applied this, I soon realized that it was thin and dried matte. :( Not only this, but after a few coats there were streaks and you could still see my nail. Darn, the color is still nice but only a decent quality.

At first, I loved this item and thought it was the best purchase I had made for my hair. I have had the straightener for about 6 months. As of a few weeks ago, I was straightening my hair when all of a sudden a spark came from the straightening iron, nearly burning my face and could have possibly set my hair on fire. After getting in touch with Farouk (the company that owns Chi)to get a new one or get my money back, they informed me that since I did not purchase the iron at a professional salon, they could not grant me a new one or a refund, for it states this in the warrenty. I am now battling with the store that I purchased it from and it is starting to look like I am out of [the purchase price].

I have a flat top hair cut and I use this product in place of butch wax. It holds almost as well, but instead of being sticking and stiff, it is soft with no stickyness and good holding power. I have very soft and fine hair, if it holds my hair in place it will hold anything - good product.

I am not an expert on skin brushing but I do not think that the brush is suppose to feel like you are scraping your skin off. This brush is VERY hard. It has thick stick like stems incorporated into the bristles. I was trying to brush as gently as I could and I was still having scrape marks on my skin. I sat with scissors and tried to cut all of the sharp stick things out of the bristles (I had a lot of time on my hands) and it still feels like a brush you would use to brush a horse. I read that a dry skin brush is suppose to be not to firm and not to soft and in my opinion this one is to hard.

Purchased directly from Amazon for $9.32. Arrived in a sealed bag, which is nice if you've ordered other stuff in the same shipment. Fresh product. I ordered in April 2012 and the expiration is stamped as January 2014. I removed the foil seal and it smelled fresh, with zero odor.The lack of scent is actually something I prefer, since I use this primarily as a facial moisturizer (a few drops go a long way). I have ultra-sensitive skin and this oil is amazing. Absorbs in a few minutes and I wear it all day with no irritation.I've been using the Now Foods Sweet Almond Oil for three months now, and even with an oily t-zone, have had no breakouts or issues that usually occur with other moisturizers. My skin actually looks more even-toned and has a healthy glow, without looking greasy (after the oil absorbs, of course).I like that this product is of high quality and that it's food grade, 100% sweet almond oil (no vitamin additives).My mom recommended this to me, and I happily recommend it to anyone wanting to try it. Hope this review helps.

Love this hand sanitizer, especially in the green apple scent. The blue raspberry scent is also nice. Would love to order it from Amazon but it's less than 1/3 of the price (99 cents!) at Target. It's in the section with all the travel toiletries.

I purchased this to treat moderate acne. I know it isn't supposed to treat cyctic acne, but I did try it out on a few and it did seem to make them smaller/disappear quicker. However, it's kind of hard to tell whether it was due to using the Zeno or other acne medications.
I was very pleased with my product. Thank You! It was the exact color I was looking for. Love it!

i liked it...it's really great for on the bus, im in highschool, when your going to basketball games that are 2 or so hours away and you want to sleep. when you wake up you can fix your hair, and it works well...some firm hold hair spray makes it work VERY good. one con of it is that it takes 12 hours to charge...and only works 45 mins. But, what can you expect for under 30 bucks?

I received my order on time. The company sent the order as I ordered it. I can't say if the product works or not because it has a scent to it that I can't take. I have only used the product one time so I guess I haven't used it enough to make a fair review but the business that sold it I would do business with again.
The fragrance is inviting. However, the scentbecomes faint within three to four hours. Not worth the price...

I bought the smaller bottle of this leave in conditioner. Definitely not worth the hype and price. It left my hair more staticky than on the days that I don't use it. Everyone also raved about the smell, but I thought it smells like dish soap. It doesn't make my hair feel softer, shinier, fuller, etc..I'll probably continue to use it because I bought it and it's not like it ruins my hair, but I'd never buy it again. I have blonde fine hair.

I tried jojoba oil for a few days. The first day I noticed a very slight itchy feel to a few places on my skin, but didn't think much of it. The next day a few itchy bumps began on one arm. I stopped using the oil immediately, but by the next day I had more red, blistery bumps on both my arms. They itched like crazy! It has been 4 days and I still have this intensly itchy rash and am trying to control it with hydrocortisone cream and benadryl. I would not recommend jojoba oil to anyone with sensitive skin.

I bought this product at my local walmart and tried it right away. It felt soo good and was very easy to use. The smell was good too. I was however disappointed the next day when I had a huge pimple on my forehead. Its to early to say if its cus of this product or not but I'm going to keep using it an find out.

It was easy to apply and stayed on well. My only complaint is the smell. It smells exactly like sunscreen, whish is not that attractive in my opinion. Now that I think about it, extra must be applied to the reddest areas. If too mush is applied to white areas, the skin turns green. it took practice, but eventually it helped. I also liked that there was no real perfum added, so it is good for my sensitive skin.

, sodium benzoate, benzyl benzoate, citronellol, fragrance (parfum). Fake fragrance and sodium benzoate. Never understand why they sell this at whole foods and how it continues to pass as "natural". I guess petroleum is natural, too. Too bad they don't list the multiple chemicals that are in the "parfum".
HUGE and I have a big head. Like the color and it does absorb sweat well. Had to take it in so it would stay on my head during yoga!
This was ordered by mistake and I will be returning it. I did recieve the intended order actually 3 days early.

For me, the color of this lipstick is perfect: just a hint of plum that brightens a deep brownish-red or reddish brown. But what is most amazing about the Prestige lipsticks is that they are long-lasting, but not at all drying, and wear off gracefully. I can go all day without retouching and still have a bit of EVEN color on my lips. I have not found another lipstick at any price that performs as well.

This was recommended to me by a Dermatologist, so naturally I came on Amazon to see the reviews first. Although it seemed like the product had mixed reviews, I went ahead and tried it for myself. I am a 28 year old female and naturally have dark circles under my eyes that I was tired of covering up with concealer. After about a week of using this product, I seemed to have more noticeable lines (wrinkles!) under my eyes than before I started using it. After two weeks, I developed what appeared to be three small growths (protruding bumps) underneath my right eye. I contacted my dermatologist who told me to immediately stop using the product. After a few days off of the product, the bumps went away. I may have had a bad batch of the product, or some weird allergic reaction, but for both reasons I would not recommend to this product to anyone--at least anyone my age that would like to avoid a product that seemed to cause premature wrinkles.

My daugther and I love this product; we are really white so went we use this product we get a beautiful color, I realy recommended the price is not bad and the smell is my favorite thing of this product, and love how the shimmer looks on your skin it looks like went you are in the beach and receive that beautiful glow with the sun, love it I realy love it.... Hope you cant tried and see what I am taking about. God Bless bye

Don't waste your time and money on this product, it does not work. I have very little grey, just a one here and there. Followed all the instructions exactly and left on for the full time. No grey coverage and no extra shine, etc.

My wife and I both get the occasional break out in what we refer to as "stress spots". Places we tend to rest a hand or what-not during times of stress. She has very dry pale skin tone and I have an oily yet olive skin tone.Our results were exactly the opposite. She seemed to get no benefit whatsoever from the product aside from what seemed like dryer skin. I had slightly drier skin (though that is admittedly very hard to quantify) yet my acne cleared right up in just a couple of days. The process was so simple that the instructions were useless after the first night.Would I recommend it to a friend? With our results I would have to say probably not unless they had a means of testing the product first. This system is a good chunk of money to end up with dry skin. Yet if you are in my shoes, the results were rather fantastic. Maybe that is the nature of these products though. Searching until you find one that works.
I grabbed this because my normal product wasn't in stock. I use it on my legs and bikini area. It is reasonably effective but I have used better.
Works pretty good. I have fine hair so I have to make sure I don't put on too much.

I've used this a few times before doing a review. I'm still on the fence on whether or not I'll keep using it. Here are my thoughts.PROS:1) heats up fast2) gets really hot3) does curl your lashes (I have asian lashes, so it took a few swipes)CONS:1) uses up batteries. It took awhile for my lashes to curl the way I like them. I think that if your eyelashes are already curly, you would save a little bit of batter power. But it won't be by much. For me, it's almost one battery per one and half usage.So in all, it's not a bad little tool, if I had the time to use it. I think I'm just so used to my manual eyelash curler (Shu Emura) that I find that using this is a little tedious.

I have found that it leaves waaaay too much soap scum even after just 3 showers. I hate cleaning the tub so often. You HAVE to clean it before a bath. It's a real pain. I have gone back to using Dove. I've used milk soap before, but a different kind, and loved it. Maybe this brand is fine if you don't take baths.
Steam is not hot enough. Price is reasonable. I've been using it for over 2 years and still working. Will get a better one with hotter steam next time.
This towel is way smaller than I thought it was going to be. It does do a good job of soaking up excess water from my hair but it needs to be bigger. I like my microfiber turban better.

I had my hopes up high when I ordered this product. I live in Michigan where the winters are very dry and the summers are extremely humid. I have thick wavy hair and after using this product my hair didn't feel much different than other products I've used. I still had frizzy hair. I'll keep using it until it's gone but I'm dissapointed it didn't work for me.

I tried this product consistently for 8 months. It did not work at all. I wish I could get my money back but the guarantee had expired. I really put to much faith in this product but I should have realized that the insufficent amount of reviews should of warned me. The company has been around for many years, there should be more results and reviews. I am now using a product that is FDA cleared Laser that has studies out and good results etc. Good luck!

I had a different Caruso Hairsetter for 12 years and it broke. The new one doesn't make the curlers as moist, so it doesn't curl the hair as well. I am very dissappointed in this product and wish I could send it back.

actually this was a gift from my sister i didn't follow the instructions. i actually apply it when ever i feel like it including before bed time. i am using this product for over a week and i am noticing a very big difference in my lashes length. the only problem is that my right eye respond more clearly than the other one but i think this is only me not the product.
A great inexpensive cologne. I have always liked this scenes in my husband. It's not too strong and it last for many hours

The Revlon RV059C Perfect Heat Professional Hair Straightener is loved by thousands born with curly hair that thinks the other side has greener grass. This hair straightening tool works so good! It has turned my untameable hair into beautiful hair. I completely depend on this one tool to keep my hair looking good because it is too short to wear curly because it fluffs too much. Sounds like the perfect tool huh? Well it is... if you don't mind having to buy six of them. I am on my sixth purchase of the Revlon RV059C Perfect Heat Professional Straightener! Each one I bought have ended up breaking before I even had it for a month! Suddenly, in the middle of getting ready to go out, it will just stop working completely. Sometime's a plate just stops working, leaving you with another half an hour of straightening your hair. I have been using the Revlon Straightener since Christmas, and I have just gone through my sixth one because they break so easily. I know it has nothing to do with my house because it has broken at two of my friends houses before and now at my dad's house. I just bought this straightener to replace the one that the plate just stopped working, and it hasn't even been two weeks, and it has already broke. I was in the middle of straightening my hair and it just cut off and won't turn back on. Now I don't know what kind of straightener I should buy that will work as good as this one. I am very hesitant on buying my seventh straightener from the same company. By the way, my friend is going on her fourth one. So you decide.. perfect.. or not?
I received this in a runny clotted condition. I am using it up anyway due to its small size but I am annoyed it's not right.

Love this fragrance,It's like standing in a flower garden,early in the morning.The sent is crisp and fresh.You almost smell the dew on roses.Inis Arose Eau de Parfum is becoming one of my favorite.I grow roses and I know their fragrance .This is roses without that over sweet smell.Someone in a beauty shop said;Oh,I am getting a faint smell of something sweet,what is that?It was my Inis Arose.Nice.
Brand new out of package and doesn't turn on or work. Frustrating. What a waste of time and money!

I received my order, and I noticed the tube package was not as advertised. Totally different product information printedon front of tube, and didn't have the (KB)KleinBecker logo at the bottom as they show in the advertisment.The product doesn't feel or smell the same as the KB StriVectin-SD I'm use too. I don't how theycan advertise this way. I returned mine. Don't know who makes it, or what's in it.I guess the price was to good to be true :(

This iron works. Most do. My hair is thin and curly. I usually have to have it on the setting for moist hair in order to straighten well. In my experience, drying before straightening produces the best results. Though I bought this iron, I regularly continue to use my other ones since the wet to dry function does not create the best look.
This really was 'mini'. I was surprised at how small it really was, but it did arrive quickly and maybe I should have paid closer attention to the word 'mini'.
This soap makes your skin so soft, never dry feeling. Sooo smoothAnd smells wonderful-- you won't want any other soap...

It does not appear to do anything for me. I started to break out after using it and after about a week I just couldn't keep using it as my face was getting worse and worse. It doesn't really lather up at all but it is a large bottle so there is a lot of product.

I received this color as a gift and was excited at the bright color. When I applied this, I soon realized that it was thin and dried matte. :( Not only this, but after a few coats there were streaks and you could still see my nail. Darn, the color is still nice but only a decent quality.

I have used this for about 10 years. It is the only conditioner that has ever worked on my dry hair. I would buy a lifetime supply if I thought it wouldn't go bad. I am always afraid they will stop making this.

it looks totally legit but there is something funny about the smell. it still smells good but doesnt seem to be a strong as the bottles at the mall. maybe thats why it was so cheap. maybe a stale batch or something.

I bought this product because I'd been researching it for a while. It is silky on your skin, but for me, I thought this product made me break out! I don't usually get lots of breakouts on my skin, but for some reason after using this I noticed more and more especially on my cheeks and forehead.I'm not sure why it didn't work for me, and I was disappointed because I do have oily skin!Maybe it was in combination with other stuff, but I didn't like it. And I didn't notice a difference at all in the amount of oil on my face.

I used to have a brush with a combination of nylon quills and bristle and it did a great job. But eventually it broke and I couldn't find one to replace it until now. Needless to say, I was pretty excited about this brush. The size is good, the bristles are good, my problem is with the nylon quills. They are longer than the bristles (as they should be) but are just strands of nylon that have been cut straight across the end, which means that they are surprisingly scratchy! Couldn't they have rounded the ends? For the price, I think so. It does an ok job getting through my long hair, but my nylon Conair does it better. So now I brush with the Conair to remove the tangles, and follow up with the Denman to smooth the hair. On the plus side, it's pretty easy to clean - the air hole is on the tip of the brush, so is easy to cover when washing.
I don't see how Le Male & Perry Ellis 360 White are "identical." They smell almost completely different to me. Le Male smell much better & doesn't give me headache, this one does.
This "perfume" smells like very strong pine scented cleaner. I contacted the seller for instructions for returning the product, which I followed, but I have not yet received a refund or credit.

When I first began to use Pureology products about a year ago, I was impressed with their efficacy. However, as I am now approaching our anniversary, I am somewhat less impressed. I have discovered that WHERE I buy the product is important. Amazon is first-rate, but buying via a supermarket is not as reliable. These products are dreadfully expensive, and if you are on a very tight budget (aren't we all?), then you should think carefully about purchasing them.

Essie has some very beautiful colors, but all the nailpolishes have formaldehyde. There are other brands that also have pretty colors and are Big 3 free. Would not recommend this product. 3 stars for the color selection.
I received this order with 2 of the bottle were spill all over the box and other bottles what a mess I love colorsBut was not impress with shipping.
To me this was too thick & sticky. I prefer a creamier gloss. The taste is also not great. Just not for me.

Disappointed with the film that Castile leaves on my stainless sink. Other than that, the product is as described. Scent is mild. While the label on the bottle is chalked full of interesting graffiti, nowhere does it give any dilution ratios. I found that very annoying. I had to look them up online.

I always used Pantene's Silver Expressions for my hair. Pantene did an excellent job of eliminating any yellowing of my hair. They no longer manufacture that product to my chagrin. I have only used Jhirmack a few times. I think it's working but it doesn't give my hair the same feeling. The hair is not yellowing but does not have the silver sheen that Pantene gave it. It also took much longer to receive than the promised date.

I was buying this as a gift for my sister-in-law and she has thick, curly hair that really requires the ceramic-ionic technology. She also wanted one with a cord keeper and I was excited to find this model that seemed to have everything she was looking for at a reasonable price, but when it arrived and I looked at the box, there wasn't anything about the diffuser that is listed in the product description. All that is included is a concentrator, which is exactly the opposite of what my sister needs. So this is going back and I'm back at square one with a very limited amount of time. At least Amazon has a good return policy!

I have using this product for a few years and have found it easy to use, and it will last through several shampoos. Properly applied it leaves your hair looking natural without an artificial look. Follow the manufacturer's directions carefully, because if you leave it on too long the more likely one is to develop some minor scalp irritation. Perform the skin patch test the manufacture recommends to help judge your sensitivity to the dye. You will need to experiment with the timing because if you shampoo off the dye too soon you will be left with grey hair. Also use something like Vaseline along the edges of your hairline as it will dye normal hairless skin. For some of you where there is more scalp than hair, you may to buy Vaseline in barrels... try to keep it on just yourself as it well stain counter tops etc. The key is to remove any excess quickly. The manufacture's directions are good, and mention all of this. This is an excellent product at an very reasonable price. Give it a try!

I got a smaller bottle of this for Christmas 2009. She liked it so much she asked for it again. I hadn't seen the price for this anywhere near what I got it from here for. She still likes it and I think it smells good on her.
This is a very lovely color, I just wish it weren't so watery and didn't require 3 layers to reach optimal pigmentation.

I love this product and it will last you a very long time. You only need a little since you are just using it for your face. I added some drops of lemon oil to the mixture and put it on my face while I slept and when I woke up my skin looked amazing! It was so smooth and you couldn't even see my pores! It reduced my pores so much! I will definitely buy this product again! I highly recommend it if you have enlarged pores or if you have scarring. It works very well.
I purchase this every year for my daughter because we cannnot get it locally. her favorite perfume. thanks for the hard to find items being available at your website.

I love love love this lipgloss. It really is the perfect shimmery pink without being too much. The only reason I give it 4 stars is because I've also fallen in love with Philosophy's "big mouth" and I can't say NARS is better.
The product arrived in record time and is as described. I would have liked a sample before I bought because the color is not right for my skin.
I loved the smell of the product but it got the bathtub messy after you're done. And who wants to spend time cleaning the bathtub after having a relaxing soak.

This prduct is OK, but just OK. Think about it: Why do they include SPF 16 in a product named and designed for nighttime use, most likely used before bed? I was curious, so I called Neutrogena to ask them. They had no answer. The young lady who answered the phone said it was because {even at night, indoors, in bed and asleep),"We are always exposed to the sun." When I asked her to explain her statement, she paused and read through her sheet of standard replies, and said, "We are very sorry for your inconvenience." Guess they had not provided her with an answer to such a basic question.This market is so competitive that all manufactures go to extremes. The names of the products get longer and longer, they contain more and more stuff, regardless of it being appropriate, such as sunscreen at night, and the truth is they are all the same, some just more expensive that others.The only thing sure for improvimng your skin is retinol. The more retinol a product contains, the more likely it is to improve your skin. Compare retinol content and go with the best price, and forget about brand names and hype. The wise thing to do is increase retinol cntent gradually (buy smallest amount of product available) and gradually to avoid irritation to the skin, and work you way up to stronger and stronger amounts and your skin required for improvement.Use your head, because the manufacturers (Neutrogena, Olay, etc.,) do not.

This didn't do a thing for me. It was a bit sticky, but didn't add definition or separate curls or any of that nonsense. I have generally healthy, medium length, fine hair (and a lot of it). I use the cleansing conditioner and stick with my Matrix gel and mousse for styling.
NAUTICA VOYAGE For Men By NAUTICA Eau de Toilette SprayNAUTICA VOYAGE For Men By NAUTICA Eau de Toilette SprayNAUTICA VOYAGE For Men By NAUTICA Eau de Toilette Spray
I bought this a few days ago and I usually like this colone for my son and it smelled old like it had expired it didn't have a date on the bottle but didn't smell like it use to.
Afraid to praise it too much. Get lots of compliments. My little secret. Don't want the price to go up

I recently bought this conditioner, and I'm sad to say I'm disappointed. I had used it before with good results, so I had high expectations. It didn't meet them. It didn't make my hair very shiny. It did make my hair soft and manageable, but I was hoping for lots of shine. Also, there's the smell. It's not a bad smell. It's not unpleasant. It's actually kind of nice. I just don't want my hair to smell like that. The smell clashes with other scented products I use, and I don't want that. I would much prefer a nice floral smell, or unscented.

After reading the good reviews of the Tantowels, I was excited to use it. I used one towellette - then another 3 hours later.First the smell - when you're applying the towelette the smell is very pleasant - basically like a normal wet-wipe. But hours later that typical artificial tan "chemical smell" appeared, and stayed there.The color is very natural looking. I really like the color.My biggest problem - streaks. I really tried to apply evenly, which I thought would be easy with the towelette. But now I have a white streak down the side of one arm, and some patchy white spots on the other arm. Also whichever part you start with, will be darker since you get less tan as the towel dries.After this fades I will try again . . . but I won't be buying another pack of Tantowels.
Pleasures is a great potpourri of scents that seem faint but ever-present in a powder. I love the way this smells on skin

This mirror is great to use for makeup although the lighting isnt bright enough. The magnification is great for plucking eyebrows! After using this mirror with the magnification, I noticed that my eyebrows were definitely nicer because I could see all the strays! The light will enhance makeup application if you have lighting that is already so-so. If you don't, you'll need an additional light source. Other than that, this is a great product.
i got this cologne for my husband for our 33 wedding weddind ann.he was very surprised to get it .i got it for a real good price with shipping included, thanks dora smith

I bought a bottle of Farah in the spring and used it once. It's now August and I opened it again and it's thick and syrupy - as if its been sitting around for years. Application was sticky and awful. It bubbled when it dried. I'm disappointed Zoya, because you do make a lot of fantastic colors, but there are lots of other companies out there doing safer polishes in just as many fun colors...Butter London, Anthropologie, Deborah Lippman, Essie...we have more choices now so I'm officially off the zoya bandwagon.

My husband visited Germany and brought this back for me. I used it all up and really missed the fresh smell and calming effect. The smell is not too fruity or perfumey, but very clean smelling. I was super excited to find this product on Amazon. The bottle is really big and all you need is a small amount in a bath tub, so it really lasts. If you are a bubble bath junkie, like myself, you have to invest in this bubble bath. There's nothing quite like it!

Bought this as a gift for my wife, and now she's looking to give it away.It is described as being floral, and people said in their reviews that it's a subtle scent - both of which my wife loves. To us, this smells like baby powder, which we both hate. Maybe other reviewers are right and this isn't the real thing, I don't know, but this also was not "delicate". My wife felt nauseous after wearing it for a little while. Once she showered it off, she felt fine.

I have fine hair and this works wonders for my natural hair. I no longer have a perm but still want that sleek look, and this gets the job done for me. Does not burn hair like the pressing combs you would place in a burner. I like the idea of knowing that I won't make the terrible mistake of placing the comb on my hair without letting it cool first.

Bought this shampoo because my hair was suffering from sun and too much time in the pool. I'm not sure that this was the right choice - bought because it was natural but think that it was meant more as a scalp therapy. Not sure I like the scent but that's a very personal thing.
Maybe it's just me but these didnt work at all. I did what I was supposed to but there were no results

I LOVE this soap! I use it for shampoo, shaving, body wash/soap, laundry, cleaning, and hand soap. I bought foaming soap dispensers and it works great! For shampoo I use it full strength but I don't need much at all! I am happy that the ingredients are organic and I LOVE that I am supporting an AWESOME company! I have other Dr. Bronner's products (chapstick, leave in hair cream, hair conditioner, other scents of the Castile soaps) and I LOVE them ALL!

This is the best styler dryer that I've found BUT it only lasts about a year. I've been looking for another brand of this style dryer but haven't found one yet. It's great if you don't mind replacing it so often. They're not cheap to replace.
I have been using this conditioner for years. Best leave in condition for me. Helps with the frizz and fly away hair.

I am all praise for the smell and longevity of curve. I also love the price very much. Very economical even for everyday use and am really very satisfied. Would strongly recommend for everyday wearing.

My husband & I both use this product and love the smell. It's a citrus floral smell and it smells divine. A little of this product goes a long way! Yes, it is very emollient and gently cleans your skin. This product rinses off easily.

Sure wish I knew before I ordered this perfume that there was no returns! It smelled terrible! Must have been on the shelves way too long. Talk about throwing money away! Thats exactly what I did, threw it in the garbage!

This product is affordable and smells great, but it does not work for me. My curly hair tends to be oily at the roots and dry at the ends. After only two days of washing my hair with Low-Poo, it had become weighed down and sticky. If your scalp does not produce much oil, this product could work well for you, since it's very gentle on curls. Otherwise you need a stronger shampoo.

I love the perfume "Lovely" by Sarah Jessica Parker. I had received a sample by mail from a local retailer, but I found I could get the same item through Amazon.com at a more reasonable price. I appreciated the sealed box as well.

I have purchased this item a month ago and all I can say- I love it!!!! Beautiful, tender color, nice scent... Just what i needed!!! I had the sam eitem few years ago and it is still my favourite lipgloss!! The shipment was very fast as well!!!

It was mistake buying a perfume just by reading amazon reviews. Everyone has different taste so you should try first before buying. Every one will not like vanilla fragrance. A word of warning, Amazon does not take returns of perfumes, it treats them as chemicals.

Was looking to replace an old Beautique brush I have had for about 15 years. The Beautique's pins/bristles are slightly larger and have a slight ball at tip which helps to keep pin/bristle from scratching scalp. Look continues.........

Absolutely the best soaps I've ever used. Unbelievable pure lavender / verbena fragrance, soft creamy lather and gently-exfoliating flower petals from the South of France! I love French Soaps' Savon de Marseille with Crushed Flowers.

It was an absolute waste of money. First, it irritated my skin and made it even drier. I thought it was an initial reaction and kept using it for for a full month. The same thing. My skin gets dry and no difference whatsoever...

This is a sturdy fine-toothed comb. The comb is very durable, but it's not too flexible. For example, I usually carry a comb in my back pocket and on a recent train trip, I didn't put the comb in my pocket correctly and it broke when I sat down. It's also kind of expensive. However, my pet Sasquatch says, "This comb pulled all the bugs and leaves out of my hair. I'll use it every time before I go out on the town." I guess it worked for him, but he doesn't comb his hair very often so I don't think he's the best one to take a recommendation from.
Love the color, but it dries matte. It's not a matte polish. So I don't know what is wrong with that.

Loved the simplicity of the bottle design.But the cologne smell is not more than average.some of my other very nive colognes that I recommend:- Cool water by Davidoff.- Extreme by Tom Ford.- Valentino V By Valentino.

I discovered a while ago that curling irons are the only thing that can create natural-looking, long-lasting waves or curls for my hair (I'm Asian and so have thick, naturally-straight hair). This was my very first curling iron, I got it just two days ago (from Walmart, actually, not Amazon, but it's exactly the same thing that you see here) and I am very pleased with it. It works very well and my hair looks beautiful.The only issue is that I always have to flip the little counter stand up and down.....I flip it up to rest it on the counter while getting the next section of hair, but I have to swing it back down to take full advantage of the barrel. I'm also a little nervous about the cord, because the cord-plug area is a little skinny/flimsy, but I hope it holds up for a while. Otherwise, great product!
this was a great set of nail colors all in good condition.gave as gift and they were very pleased with it

I purchased this flat iron from Amazon EXACTLY 60 days ago and this morning, when I plugged it in the red light turned on.....when I came back to straighten my hair a little while later, the light was off and the iron was cool. After going to work with frizzy hair I returned home to try it again...no luck. I should have listened to the other negative reviews on this site. The iron is not covered by the warranty because it was purchased from Amazon, not an authorized hair salon! I took my chances when ordering the iron because the price was right....Buyer BEWARE, spend a few more dollars and buy it from a hair salon. Ulta Beauty has the iron for a similar price when it's on sale! Like some other reviewers I think this is a cheaper version of the ones that sell in salons. My daughter has the Paul Brown flat iron and it's been great for over a year!

This clear top coat is the best one I have ever found. I have been using it for the past 5 years, and I have been using nail polish since 1978. It covers great, dries super-fast, and looks good. I am always looking for a good price on it on-line. It is hard to find in stores - Ulta is often out - but I don't go to beauty specialty shops so maybe it is easy to find at those. Anyway this was a good price.It arrived in a mailing envelop and I thought it might be smashed, but it wasn't. I will buy another because my daughter may steal this one, lol.

Overall, Coriandre is an easy-to-wear chypre (really?) that is as season-less & classic as a lightweight gabardine suit. The opening is crisp, clean & clear. The coriander note is subtle to me, not spicy, and I have no problems with wear. As it goes into the heart, I am picking up a bit a soapiness & barely-there soft florals. Dries down to a dry moss & vetiver scent, yet it's quite feminine to me.Coriandre is a soapy woody on me that's not very long-lasting. I've heard so much about the rose in Coriandre, but it's nothing to write home about in the formulation that I'm testing. In fact, I purposely picked up the 33ml frosted cylindrical bottle based reports that it was close to the original rose chypre formulation. Sadly, it's not.This Coriandre might be a good choice if you're tired of big floral scents and overtly sweet ones. However, I wasn't looking for a soapy woody floral, and there are no redeeming qualities in this fragrance that would encourage me to give it shelf space.

The "light" feature is virtually useless. The amount of illumination is negligible so you need to be in a very well-lit room already to take full advantage of this mirror.The amount of magnification is also not as great as some other mirrors. Coupled with the smaller than average size and you need to get up real close...A plus is the fact that, if you do want the light, it runs on batteries so you don't have to have a cord and plug running across your sink/ vanity/ make-up table.Final negative is the "Revlon" on the base. I hoped it was a removable sticker for packaging only, but alas, Revlon wants to make you part of their advertising.

My wife feels we've been ripped-off!!!! She has used this particular fragrance before, and feels that what we received is a poor "knock-off"!!!! She has forbidden me from purchasing fragrances on-line in the future. We're VERY disappointed.

Terre D'Hermes takes me back to Corsicana, Texas - a local drugstore where I got ice cream after visiting the eye doctor. Three times a week my mother drove me to the eye doctor for eye therapy to help correct my "lazy eye."Whirling discs, eye patches, 3-D glasses flipped every hour, drops, flashlights in the dark - all worked to give me control of my eyes. Well, the surgery at age seven didn't hurt either. Wait! Yes it did!But, now I am able to keep my eyes straight.Three times a week the 60 mile trek in our old Buick let me come closer to controlling my eye positions. And, after each visit, my mother would take me into the drugstore for ice cream. But the scent wasn't ice cream.Terre D'Hermes has an incredible earthy scent. It has tones of earth, fern, musk (the good kind), bark, green - and some magical reminder scent of that drug store.People always compliment me when I wear it. Close friends say, "You're wearing that amazing scent again."Yes, I am.

As a turquoise fanatic and nail polish enthusiast, I had to purchase this.Pros:-Only two coats needed-Bright color-Dries insanely fastCons:-Appears to be flat, no shimmer /gloss to it and thus a top coat of clear is needed. Some girls choose to skip this step but you can't really do that with this one.-The turquoise ended up being a teel that leans very green. This wasn't what I was looking for at all.-Thin polish that chips easily, another reason to need a top coat of clear.

I've owned two of these curling irons and both times I've had issues with the on/off buttons. The first iron I had, the off button quit working; meaning I'd have to unplug the thing to turn it off. The iron finally just quit working. When I got my second iron (thinking this couldn't possibly happen again), within 2 weeks, and mind you, I only use the curling iron 2-3 times a week, the off button felt loose and I had to wiggle it to turn it off. Within 2 months, the on button fell into the curling iron.... never to be seen or heard from again. I'm done with this product!

Received case and was disappointed. The inside trays are lined with foam which wasn't stuck to the trays properly and the foam on the dividers are not even sticky enough in order for them to stay down.

Half-strength at best. Some is cheating. I've been using this product for years and the last one I bought "stinks!" (pun intended.) It's all alcohol and no fragrance - someone is diluting the fragrance and charging too much for a bogus product. I won't buy this from anyone but a dept. store now.
Got the item okay, but returning it has been a nightmare. I've sent multiple emails to the seller and have received no reply.
It's not as good as the original. My eye shadow creases by mid-day with this one and it didn't with Mary Kay's original.

Well, I bought this stuff after I heard it smelled unique and amazing. It does smell unique that is for sure.Some responses I have received:"You smell like syrup.""You smell like cinnamon bread.""You smell like the partner (a 60 yr old grizzly adams man).""What's that cinnamon smell?""Did you bring in pillsbury rolls?"I have not received one good comment unless you think smelling like food is a good comment.Will be trying something new very soon.
I like the sweet smell of vanilla but it doesn't last all day. Still it's a good product,I use sometimes.

I was expecting a product with the same quality than those which are sold in the big stores such as J.C. Penny or Macys. However, this perfume is pure alcohol base that evaporate in minutes. Not even my cloths or my skin keep the smell for more than 10 minutes of used.Overall the product was shipp at the expected time.
does anybody know what temperature this flat iron goes to???? i have really thick hair, so ive always bought flat irons that at least go to 410 degrees, but i dont see a temperature anywhere.

I have long hair (waist length, but thin). I prefer to air dry my hair, but that is just too uncomfortable in the winter, so I decided to try the turban.I love the microfiber. I believe it really does help my hair dry more quickly. Note, I said more quickly. Not necessarily quickly. I love that the turban holds my hair off of my neck and back. Ideally, it always does that. Realistically, while my hair all fits in the turban, wrapping it so I can button it, and it stays in place, is a pain! Really difficult for me to do (but maybe it's easier for more coordinated gals).I'd give the microfiber itself four stars, but because the turban is a hassle, I'm only giving this product three stars. If I needed another such product I'd just buy a microfiber towel.

I was tremendously dissapointed with this product. First off, it took forever to get to me, actually arriving well after the date it said it was going to. They also used waaaaay more packaging than was remotely necessary - a huge 9"x10" envelope for this tiny little jar. And lastly the jar was really really really small, if I put makeup in there I have no idea how I would get it out again without making a huge mess since the top is too small for anything larger than an eyeshadow brush and it only has three holes in the top anyway. Booo.

I wanted a powder eye liner. I guess I should've known it was going to be messy. But I don't really use it because it gets all over my counter, but even worse all over my face. I like how it looks but at some point in the day it rubs off onto my face. I also wish that included was a little dish or something to mix the powder with water, I just use a small mirror. I am went back to using my liquid liner.

I bought this cologne merely after reading a few reviews on amazon... may be i should have tried it on personally before i bought it. The cologne actually smell nice. Its got a nice fresh smell to it. The only thing is since it was made in the 80's all the older people have used it and kind of smells old. If you are in your 20's i wouldn't recommend this, may be if in you late 30's.The smell remains for 4-6 hrs depends on various factor, fades away nice smelling too.
