I've been braiding hair for over 10 years and this is definitely not 100% hair. Then again, you get what you pay for.I will say, however, that I bought this hair and it arrived in 3 days. (great on the seller's part.. thank you!) but as for the product itself, I won't be purchasing it again. I went ahead and used this hair on myself and my braids look fine, as they usually do.. but I can definitely notice a difference when I play with it. My braids have been in for about 2 weeks now and they still look good.. so if you don't mind a majority of a synthetic hair as opposed to human hair (blend), then go for it. But you've been warned!

I am a 40+ year old man. I get this mainly because the normal skin so soft works well against bugs. I don't like chemical bug repellent even the one that skin so soft puts out. The normal one does great and I am real happy with it. It smells great. Happy camper. Dave

Sadly, this product didn't do much for my psoriasis. The itching and the dandruff became worse. Despite that I would like to say that it does make hair soft and manageable. Of all the medicated shampoos I have tried, it's the best one for that. I'm sorry this product didn't work for me though. It might still work for someone else.

I received this lotion in a gift pack containing in addition to the lotion a shower gel, a candle and a loofah mitt. (Don't ask about the loofah mitt - the hemp was so rough that it actually scraped).This is an okay lotion. The addition of lavender and Shea Butter sounds good, but I can't find the proportions of either on the bottle. The lavender fragrance is very muted, and doesn't really smell wonderful such as in say, L'Occitane. Somehow, due the moisturizing effectiveness I wonder if there isn't quite enough Shea Butter included.On the plus side it is a very generous 16 oz. bottle for not very much money. (Who was it who said you get what you pay for?)

I purchased this a little over 2 weeks ago, and so far it seems to be an excellent product. The only problem is I didn't actually purchase it from Amazon but through one of their suggestions, and I had to sign for it and missed the mailman the first time he brought it. Next time I will make sure I purchase it from Amazon, but I am a new customer and wasn't aware of what I was doing.
I am not impressed. The colors are light when applied, and it gets greasy and sticks in the creases of your eyelid.
this has a weird smell, it works pretty well but I almost try not to use it unless completely necessary because of the bad smell.

This is a VERY basic hairdryer. It has no attachments, and no heat control. It also has only 2 fan speeds. Other than that, it does what it is suppose to do - dry hair. If you want a cheap, basic hair dryer, this serves the purpose.
Please do not buy this item. It does not have any quality of other polo products. If you buy any perfume go with other companies. Do not waste your money. I feel I have wasted my money.

It smells nice (just like you remember) but fades quickly and isn't worth it. I bought this for something cheap to wear to work but will go back to wearing Paco Rabanne's 1 Million (way stronger and better!). Spend the extra cash, trust me.
I used this for skin sores from shingles and dry skin. When I'm at home I use the lotion because I find it easier to apply. When I'm traveling I take the cream, it is more convenient.
LOVE IT!! Try this fragrance, you will love it and others will too. Very clean and light smelling...Great product. Thank you Philosophy!!

I love this hair dryer it makes my hair softer and dryes very fast and I have very long thick natural hair (african american), and the solano international 2 in 1 professional comb goes great with it sold separate
I use Eternity all the time and know its scent. Buy it in Macys or other trusted stores.

I love China Glaze polishes... good quality for a great price. In the picture this colour looks like a deep coral but when i applied it last night, it is practically orange. Still a pretty colour, just not what I was expecting.
I love Fantasy, but this one almost has a grape smell to it. Also, it doesn't last as long as Fantasy.

i am well pleased with the quality and utility of this product. the comb fits well in my pocket and produces an effect upon my hair that makes styling in any particular way easy.i am sure that i will have this product for a good long time without the worry of losing its teeth.many thanksharry ruggeroli

My 2.5 year old son sucks his thumb when he's sleeping. I tried this product hoping it would stop him from sucking his thumb & it did! The first time I put it on his thumbs was before his nap. He cried for 20 mins saying his thumb was grody!! I coat his thumb nails in the morning before he leaves for daycare & at night before bed. I've only had the product for about 2 weeks but it has worked wonders. I would highly recommend this product to parents who child has a thumb sucking problem. He actually ask for me to paint his nails before bed now & says I don't suck my thumb.

I've tried all of Dr. Bonner's soap and love them all. However this is the 1st time I've tried the Rose and it has such a wonderful scent. I've used this product for well over 10 years and have share how nice it is to others. Once you try it you will not go back to regular soap.
The shipping was fast and the straightening comb works really well, I am satisfied.

This product is intended for dry, sensitive skin, which I have. It is a moisturizing deodorant soap bar. I didn't like the strong deodorant scent. I prefer a softer one. It also didn't seem to moisturize very well. It does have a good lather, though and rinses without leaving behind a filmy residue.

I bought this because for two reasons: I trust Coppertone as a brand, and I LOVE the smell of this stuff. Water Babies, Dreft & original Johnson's & Johnson's baby shampoo are all scent-heaven to me.Unfortunately though, I had to discontinue using it. I put some on my 5 month old son, and he developed a sensitivity to it and broke out in an ugly rash. After a trip to the pediatrician and a prescription for 2% hydrocortisone ointment, we realized it was probably from the -benzone's in the sunscreen. Evidently this is a somewhat common reaction to those ingredients, at least according to a Google consensus.Let me say that my son is NOT one of those sensitive-skinned, bubble-baby types. We use plain Dreft or Tide on his clothes, he gets scented lotions & powders and regular old Johnson's bath products. I was a bit shocked when he all of a sudden had a reaction to a health & beauty type product. The only other thing he has had a reaction to is Huggies diapers (Pampers are fine though). And believe me, I am ALL about baby-scented-products. Anything to cover up the poop smell is fine by me :)We switched to Neutrogena Pure & Free Baby, which is a zinc oxide product with good results. However, that stuff is rather spendy for how much sunscreen we go through (ten for a 3 oz bottle vs. seven for a 8 oz bottle of Coppertone!), so I am now going to try to the "Free & Clear" version of my beloved Water Babies. If only it smelled like the original... (but it did live up to it's Tear Free promise!)

I received it today, but when I opened the package, I found that it's not the one showed in the picture on amazon.com, it's actually another Spray (3.3 ounces), but I don't want to change it anymore because I like its smell.

We bought this product for my four year old. She likes to suck on two of her fingers on a particular hand and we had hoped to help her to stop. We explained to her while we waited for the product to arrive what would happen and she was very excited and happy. She has made comments that she wants to stop to. When we got the product we applied it to her fingers and it did taste nasty. It worked great for the first day. But while the box says to apply every two days, we discovered on the second day that it needed to be applied every 12 hours and then by the third day every 8. And by the fourth, it seemed to not have an effect on her at all. She may have gotten used to the taste or it may have been washing off, but either way, by the fourth day it wasnt working. A habit supposedly takes 21 days to break, but we didnt even make it past 4. I would not recommend this for a younger person. It may work on an adult though.

Well - I just killed it. I guess my hot air styler sucked in one too many pieces of my hair. This has been an ongoing problem in the year I've had it. While doing a nice job at making my hair less frizzy and adding volume; it also ate my hair... a lot... despite all attempts to get my hair away from the air intake.I just went to turn it on. No noise, no air, just a burning smell.It worked really nicely though and I love the compact size, great for travel. I'm debating over getting another one. If I do, I'll definitely register the warranty!
I guess it works. I don't really know how to tell if the item is working or not, but since I keep buying it it most be doing something (smile)

I waited a little before i did this review, but that's only because i wanted to be nice and give them back their product. but i won't hold my tongue now so here goes:1. this product smells HORRID ! green apple ? not even close. more like fish and salt& vinegar chips (and maybe a little more, but i refused to use it again once i closed the bottle lol) it honestly made me want to gag!2. it doesnt do anything a good leave in conditioner would do! so why bother having my hair smelling like fish and chips if i can use a conditioner ?3.i barely used any and it stil flaked into booger-like crumbles, which looked sooo nasty in my hair >_<4. i paid for the product + shipping and handling. i dont care how much you decide to put as a shipping price, but when i want an unsavory product sent back, i should be able to right ? NOPE. they sent me a bogus shipping label that i could have printed myself. so basically they want me to have to pay all charges to send it back to them. apparently they dont want their product either. but I DONT WANT TO SPEND ANY MORE MONEY ON THIS PRODUCT, WTF!!!! so they're gonna have to fix that ASAP.VERY DISSATISFIED.DONT EVEN LOOK TWICE AT THIS PRODUCT.until i get my money back ;)
Real good product and recommend to others. My wife and daughters are very happy with it and use it all the times.

Back years ago this scent was somewhat ok, I remember having a small bottle of it someone gave me.I thought I would enjoy it again so asked for it as a gift.I was wrong.It was heavy and gave me somewhat of a headache.It's to old lady like.And very musky.I wouldn't recommend this scent.I sold it on ebay.I have noticed yellow or golden colors of perfume are too strong and musky.

The polish looks much lighter in the bottle in real life than in the picture, but it's much brighter on your fingers than in the bottle. It's also pearlescent, which was kind of a surprise to me. I love the color though, along with China Glaze in general. It dries SUPER FAST.The product is very hard to work with, however. Since it's a white based color, it's hard to get it to apply evenly. It's also very matte, so if you want it to be shiny, use a top coat.

Goldwell website claims this is ONLY sold to select salons and distributors. Amazon is not one of them? I am so sick of getting these type of items "fake". Why??These are huge jugs of product but if you look at the bottles the label comes right off (label is plastic, stick on that includes codes, evertyhing). You could easily put these labels on any old bottle of shampoo/treatment. There is NO WAY to know if these are real or authentic. Bottom Line.

This product makes my hair very soft and silky. I love the way my hair feels after I use it. As far as reducing frizz goes, I do have to admit, I have had other products work better. Moroccan Oil or Pureology Serum have worked a little better for me, but those products also leave my hair feeling greasy or heavy. This product provides a weightless feel and my hair is super silky. I love mixing it in with my leave-in conditioner. I am probably going to purchase this product again, just because I love the way it makes my hair feel and it does reduce frizz.

I decided to try this product. I am starting to see the wrinkles and fine lines. I definitely felt the stinging/burning sensation the first time I tried it. I could only keep it on for 1 minute. I've been doing this treatment for a few weeks now, once a week. I'm not sure if I see the difference, but my co-worker said my face looked different. After using the product a few more times, I can tolerate the stinging for longer now, I'm up to 3-4 minutes now. I haven't had any recent acne break-outs so I am assuming this is a contributing factor.
The pic of this color is way off, its hot coral not pink. I love it, I wore it ALL summer on fingers AND toes!
It doesnt do anything to my hair but take an hour to dry it and make it frizzy. Doesnt do what it says it does. it makes it very poofy & frizzy.

It seemed to work really well. But did dry out my skin. The instructions suggest using it a lot less frequently at first and I would highly recommend that also (especially if you have sensitive skin).
I had no idea what this smelled like, but at 75% off, I figured "what the heck"? Boy was I wrong...this stuff is awful.

I haven't tried many dry shampoos but this for me was okay. It does the job of removing the oil from your hair. But it's difficult to rub it in well enough (I have blonde hair) to get rid of the powdery look it leaves behind. It also would leave flakes sometimes and give an appearance of dandruff...not cute.

This is a good overall cutter. It comes with all the necessary combs in all of the standard lengths, and the cutter has a taper control so you can adjust the length even further. It includes scissors, hair clips, a vinyl apron, brushes, and a decent storage case to put everything in. It has everything I was looking for.I have been using this to keep my hair between 1/4" and 3/8" for the last two months. I cut my hair twice a week, every 4-5 days. The cutter does a good job, as long as you have patience and control. I can get the cut I want within 15 minutes. I prefer to use the unit plugged in, because I find that it runs slower from the battery alone. However, that said, I found that it would allow me to cut my hair at least 3 times before I had to recharge. This is pretty significant and acceptable. It also takes a long time to completely charge the battery (the manual states 14 hours), but there is no indication that charging is completed -- the charging light is always lit when it is plugged in.It's lightweight and easy to handle. The cord is long enough to use when plugged in. Controls are simple and smooth.The included trimmer is OK, not great. I have used it to clean up my sideburns and neck line, but prefer to use a trimmer on my shaver instead. The included trimmer runs on 2 AAA batteries, and it also seems to run a little slower than I expected. However, it doesn't scratch, and I have sensitive skin, so although it's not a quality item, it does the job.Overall I'm happy with this device and don't have any complaints.

I purchased this product after an article on the dangers of some sunscreen ingredients. Received in good time from Amazon. The bottles were so small and really meant more for just babies. I was hoping to have my teen use these products in his soccer bag.

I've used Big Sexy Hair Volumizing Detangler for several years and have always purchased it from a local Beauty Supply house. Unfortunately about a year ago this place closed. I ran out a few months later and have been without this product for at least 6 months and I really miss it. I've tried several other products, some much more expensive, but none of them make my hair look as good. I can't live without this stuff. It gives my hair volume, makes it so easy to comb out after shampooing and gives it a beautiful healthy shine. I just love it! I have semi-fine hair but a lot of if and it works perfectly for me. I'm so thrilled I found it on Amazon. I should have known! Amazon came thru for me again...THANK YOU AMAZON!

Hello,Received 1st order included two free sample slices of soap 1 - frankincense other (2) myrrh.1st impression (did not like odor). Opened - ??? Maybe two scents together clashed.SMELLS Great - Myrrh is more woodsy for men, but may appeal to women remind me of log cabin outdoor person would love.Curious - samples instructions to use as potpourri, used frankincense to wash face.BEST SOAP- (I have sensitive skin) only use clearsil soap or black soap.BENEFITS - (I thought the reviews were overrated, but they are not).... Face felt refreshing cleaner than ever hard to explain.Skin was smooth, face felt great kind of like after a mask treatment (if you have used before).SKIN TYPE: African American/SensitiveSUMMARY - Thanks for free sample.you must try this soap - Will order few bars different scents in goat milk.

I used this item, wasn't impress, I know no product is going to remove wrinkles, but didn't notice any difference on my skin.I am better off for the price, to buy the cheaper product that I have been purchasing from my local CVS. I do have to say in their behave, they ship fast.

Ok I was really excited when I first got this it was very small but beautiful holder. Then comes the perfume when I first used it the scent was very faint but it stay on my skin the whole day which was nice but then the second and third time around the scent was harder to find until I cant smell it at all but wax blah.

I am surprised to see that it is hard to put away in case and I would like a way to talk to someone on the shipping for $19.99 and it took almost 5 days to get, I WON'T BE ORDERING AGAIN. If I was to get a call and get a refund, I am concerned about the bad reviews that I have seen for this product.
This perfume is okay if I hold it at a distance over my head and spray so it drifts down onto me - otherwise it is too strong for my taste.

Convenient and inexpensive but I like the old product better. The old product did not drip had a much better feel to them. I ordered several boxes because of the price but I did have another problem. The wipes I purchased were not due to expire for another eight months, however, I have opened several wipes that have already dried out.
Used this product on alternate days for a few weeks. Used it on the temples, and nothing happened. The situation worsened at best
this blow dryer is excellent but be prepared it's heavier than most and is also very powerful. on high heat and maximum speed it has a tendency to tangle my hair. very very good product though.

I really have no idea what the fascination is with this brand. I've tried so many shades hoping that maybe the last was a fluke. But, this brand is awful IMO. It's difficult to apply, applies streaky, and chips so easily. I much prefer OPI.

The Triple Power Gel Strengthener from Nutra Nail didn't really live up to the claims on the package for more than until I had to put my hands in water. I have tried it about 6 times already, and it never fails to start peeling off from the edges on the same day it is applied. I have even tried using less than the recommended coats (2 initially, nail polish and then 2 more coats after). Still the desirable results only for the moment. I was really disappointed. The package recommended returning to product to the company for a full refund if the desired results were not attained, however, because I have been trying so many times to make it work, of course I could no longer locate the receipt. It was only 5 dollars anyway, I'd probably have to pay a comparable amount for the shipping.The verdict: Looks really nice at initial application, but doesn't stay on past the end of the day.As I write this review, I am trying the Power Gel Nail Hardener formula. I'll write a review on that later as I ascertain the results.Happy nail care.

This polish, in color Pippa, is the worst I have encountered by Zoya. It is thick and bubbly. It won't spread out and looks like Swiss Cheese as it dries. I have not been able to use it once since I ordered it. I like the seller just fine, but they do not except returns. Still, this is something I would have never paid for had I known. I was really looking forward to wearing beautiful bright yellow polish. I guess I'll just have to wait a while, as I can't get this kind of polish where I live (I'd try the Butter color next) (on an island) and shipping for one nail polish is ridiculous.

These combs actually appear on the screen larger than the actual size, so be careful that the smaller version is the one you actually want. There was also a 7 inch comb, which is the one I would have rather purchased, but by the time I received them, it was too late for me to exchange them.

When my old blow dryer bit the dust I thought I was going to have to pay some outrageous price to get a decent dryer. This product meet my expectations and then some. Given my previous dryer was a Brookstone Travel hair dryer, so it didn't have all that many features, but it was compact and lasted me a good 6-7 yrs. Anyway, I love all the different heat settings, and it leaves my hair feeling a lot lighter than I'm used to. On the downside, it's rather heavy (though again, I'm switching from a little travel hair dryer), I sort of feel like I have to grow some extra muscles in my hands for this thing.

I might have given this product more stars, but the scent is similar, if not identical, to the scent worn by someone I can't stand, and I couldn't separate the two. I couldn't even put it on--just gave it away. Sorry I couldn't be more objective.

I have thick wavy long blonde hair. I'm trying to tame it without spending an hour or two in the process. Unfortunately, for me, this brush is only ok. The size is good for my long hair but the tines are so short that I can only brush a very small section of hair at a time or half my hair blows away. If the tines were twice as long it would be the right brush for me because it would be able to hold larger sections of hair without them slipping away.

I was super excited when I first received this because I had been wanting to buy it for several months. And when I tried it out I fell in love with it immediately. Unfortunately, that only lasted a few uses. For some reason (I've had it about 2 weeks), it just doesn't crack right anymore. It's very goopy. And if you take more than one swipe to cover your whole nail, it will be thicker in the middle where you apply more than one coat. Also, if you mess up, you have to redo the entire nail (base coat and all).

When it says neon it's definately what I think of when I hear the word neon. Bright and bold!You need around 3 coats to make it look even and like all China Glaze neons it is matte. I love this color for deigns on my nail, but it's not my favorite overall nail color for a better alternative orange from China Glaze I would recommend Papaya Punch for China Glaze's 2011 Island Escape collection.
But took 3 weeks to receive it.. I pretty much forgot that I had ordered it. This is my favorite face soap

I tried this and it did seem to work, however, the pad no longer sticks to me and it has only been 2 weeks since I started using it. I would highly recommend this if it either came with replacement pads or if it did stay adhesive longer. I'm currently looking for a replacement.

I was recommended to use Aubrey organics and I honestly do not like any of their products.As for this one since its watery you can use this as a skin toner like witch hazel.Aloe vera contains natural anti-bacterial and anti-inflammatory properties.Its gentle and cool on the eyes while wiping you face.

I intially wrote a terrible review because I was not using it correctly. Then I realized I needed to hook the dryer behind the stand holder. Now it holds the dryer well. However the extender does not stay stiff and you cannot really adjust the height. The extender just stays down at the lowest height. But it basically is ok.

I'm a huge Bumble & Bumble fan, but this one is literally like a jar of wax. It definitely has major control for your hair, but I pretty much need to wash my hair before going to bed unless I want it all over my pillow and getting on my face while I sleep.If you're looking for something that waxy it's probably great but I think the less waxy version in the black jar is better and less extreme.

Makes my skin feel amazing, but the smell is just gross. It has a weird after smell, it's hard to explain, but def not something you want to smell all day. Also the bottle is small so if you are using it as an all over lotion, you will go through it really fast.

you can't tell from the photo that this is a sparkly color... but i figured i'd keep it for a halloween costume or some crazy night out. the shade of blue is really nice, just wish it was not full of glitter

It work from the very first week I started using it. I use it at night and in the morning.I work late hours and I've been having a problem with puffy eyes. This gel has really help me decrease the puffiness.I recommend it.

The product arrived quickly but i was curious if my sisters would think it smelt good at all so I sprayed it on a piece of paper and let them smell it and they immediatly said it smelled terrible. I have not field tested it and may try combining it with my addidas colonge and see if that combats the smell so i can get results. Will write a review later describing my findings.
I was a little disappointed with this lip pencil. It was nice, the way it is designed; flat; but, it was very dry and too dark.
I bought this for my flare up psoriasis to remove the severe itch and and relief from the lesions on my scalp. I didn't like the product - seem to itch more after application.

There is something in this gel that my skin REALLY doesn't like. I have pretty sensitive skin, but after using this for a couple of days, I haven't seen it get this red and irritated in years. Tread with caution if you have sensitive skin.

I got this for my halloween costume and while it got the job done, it wasn't a product I'd look forward to using again. The coverage wasn't great. I had to use 2 cans to cover my updo and even then you could still kind of see my light brown hair under the white spray. It also made my hair very much like helmet and pretty much destroyed the curls I had spent so much time putting into my hair (since it weighed my hair down SO much.)

My T3 just stopped working after 3' MONTHs, 3 months !!!I am a professional and can NOT afford for this to happen while blowdrying a clients hair.This has NEVER, ever, happen to me with ANY other professional blowdryer !I am taking One more chance on this product since, I have a bad shoulder &it really is light weight & leaves the hair very smooth & shinny...LAST CHANCE T3 !side note: There are plenty of other blowdryers that also can do a great job !

I am unsure of how to work this properly. It is not intuitive. It tells you in the directions that it takes awhile to get used to. But I find myself going back to my old straightener instead of taking the time to make it work the way I would like.

I was researching Emu oil for hair growth for my eyelashes and stumbled upon a blog that suggested adding this. I had been using the Emu and while it was working great i'm of the mindset that if some is good, more is better. I added this to the mix. My eyelashes are still growing and the hair i lost in my brows with the permanent tattoo is still coming in. I have no idea if this works or not..haha!! If you are thinking of using this on your head you must be a person who washes their hair daily. This creme is a bright blue that stays blue after application. The first night i used it my granddaughter told me i had used wayyyy too much eye shadow.....haha
The scent of the perfume received was mild and is definitely an imitation of the product. I have another bottle to compare with and it was not the same at all. Very disappointed.
Good sturdy and good looking/quality product. We just hoped the shipping package was a bit more sturdy to keep it from breaking in transit (not that our was damaged)good product!

This happens to be my personal favorite cologne and I have been told by several stores that it was discontinued so I can't buy it locally anymore! It arrived in a nice package on time and was sealed shut. I will definitely be ordering another bottle from the seller when I run out!

This is one of the few scents that I can wear. I have allergies to many chemicals. This perfume is made from essential oils and lasts longer than others I've tried. It has a complex warm spicy scent that can be worn by men or women.

I've purchase a similar product in the past from Whole Foods Market and I fell in love with it. It was the perfect size and texture and it lasted many years before I had to throw it away. I decided to get a new one, so I purchase this product after reading the glowing reviews. It didn't come with any instructions really on how to break it in or take care of it, regardless it look very small (11"x11"?, I think it's real shady when you can't read the box on Amazon, the picture and what I have look different, and they don't even tell you the size on Amazon) compare to the one I had before and this one is a lot rougher too. I used it once and the thing twisted and shriveled up and now I'm left with something that looks like a 2"x7" pork rind. This is handmade and it's quite apparent because of all the imperfections. For crying out loud, I scrub my thigh this morning and ended up cutting myself because a part of the cloth decided to shank me? Now I have two minor, but bloody red lines on my left thigh. Please avoid this product!!! I had to learn the hard way. So do yourself a favor and continue searching for that perfect cloth and I hope you find it!

With a name like "Kiss My Face" I was hoping for soap with a pleasant smell but it smells like wet cardboard. Very unappealling muddy green color. It doesn't lather up very well and didn't seem to have any moisterising effect at all. I gave it two stars because it rinses well.

I'd been searching for something I could use on my face to cut down the oil product. My nose and forehead areas get SO oily that it makes makeup impossible. I shine so brightly with or without makeup that it got to be a problem and I wanted to find a way to cut that down. I saw all the great reviews that were posted on amazon and I actually found it at my local drug store on sale. Score one for me!Yes, it cleans very well. It also makes my skin so smooth. I love the feeling after I've washed my face. The problem? Didn't cut down my oil production at all. I'm still just as shiny as I've ever been so this didn't help me one bit. I also noticed that when I began using it, I broke out. I guess my skin needed to get used to it so I continued for about 2 weeks and I was still getting new bumps just as fast as old ones went away. I stopped using it and went back to my old face wash, I cleared up, then went back to this and broke out again, except it wasn't as bad.I will try again in the future and hope for the best, but for now, I'm going back to my old face wash and will just pat the shiny areas dry as often as I can think about it.

This dryer doesn't get as hot as my previous Revlon dryer. It gets hot, but only in the Hot & High setting, but not in the Hot & Low setting, which I would use for styling. It takes longer to dry my hair and I can't get it to look the same as it did with my previous dryer.

I have used this twice along with the other products in the Regenerist line. My skin is very,very soft!It smells fantastic! Like oranges.The only thing I dont like about it is when you apply the derma-crystals (step one) you have to rub it in for a minute and it really is uncomfortable! It feels just like rubbing sand on your face.The first time I used it I felt like I had a "sunburn feel" on my face. But it went away after a couple days. I follow this with the Daily Serum.
This product really does feel like silk....Out of all the eye products, I really like this one. I would recommend it!

I started using Burt's Bees Repair Serum around my eyes to soothe and moisturize after I had an allergic reaction to an expensive eye cream (rash, redness, & wrinkly skin). It was the only thing that didn't irritate the skin around my eyes. My eyes took a good two weeks to return to normal, so I wouldn't say that the serum accelerated healing, but at least it moisturized without irritating. Since then, I've been using it at night as an all-over moisturizer. It doesn't clog pores & does a good job of moisturizing. But I wouldn't say that it repairs or improves wrinkles - I haven't noticed any improvement in my skin over a month of using it. I'm 40, with a fair amount of sun damage, fine surface wrinkles around my eyes, deep laugh lines, and the "elevenses" between my eyebrows - no improvement in any of these conditions. But I'll continue to use it and night, and keep it around as a fallback moisturizer when my skin feels sensitive. I've gotten used to the smell, but not everyone will like it - it smells like a hempy, earthy lavender.

This product works as promised, stimulating a "slightly puffy lip" response within one minute or less... However, it is gone within about 20 minutes. So you will feel great walking out the door or getting a quick photo...but it doesn't last long. In my experience, a reapplication does not give the same response... unless you wait for a few hours or wash off all your lip stain or lip stick and re-apply. And, not much in the .29oz tube...for the cost.But it does exactly what it promises.

I recently purchased this product and I love the color of the blush it is great. But the top to get in the product sucks. It is so hard to get the top off I almost regret getting it. The packaging is so important because I am a freelance makeup artist and I need to get in and out of my makeup with ease. This blush is very hard to get into, which slows me down. So, I love the color but hate the packaging.
Little sporty. Does not last through the day. Ok to try but not likely to buy again. Gave it three stars
I have very short hair, and although it's the narrowest I could find, it's really hardly usable on most of my hair.

This is probably one of the best shampoos in this category and at a good price. Like the smell as well (as some shampoos smell like hospital). There is a noticeable difference when you wash with this shampoo vs. standard, and it leaves your hair dryer/thicker (likely because it has no conditioner/lotion in the formula), Highly recommend

I read the reviews and was hoping, honestly, for a real dramatic shimmer effect. I work on stage and wanted a really glimmery appearance. Overall, I feel that the effect is more subtle than the other reviews imply. I still like it though and got a couple of compliments on my skin.Note: the powder comes out very slowly. If your turn it over and tap, tap, tap the bottom with your application brush into the lid of the container, you can get enough out to do the job.

I purchased this for an Inuyasha fan, as a christmas present. Despite being notified the item would not be received until after the tholidays, the item arrived the very last shipping day before Christmas. Kudos!The product itself is nicely made. The material is soft, the head band is rigid but flexable and comfortable to many head-sizes, from our two-year old son, to my massive mellon. The ears however nicely shaped and colored, are rather small. When placed on even our 2-year old son's head they look dwarfed, as opposed to the scale of the Inuyahsa artwork, where they are rather large.Increase the size of the ears and this ould be an absolutely perfect item. But considering the whole purpose of the item is the ears, that dashes the rating down to 3.

I've used conair hot rollers for about 15 years. These are great, but I find it really annoying that the clips do not have a holder in the case. It is the 1st time the case does not have that. I know it sounds petty, but I can't stand that I need to get another holder for the clips.
I am now on my third coat, I have yet to see a change in color. True I am fair but I suspected to see something that looked like a tan. Not worth the money.

My Mom has suffered from rosacea for years. After using this product for a few weeks, there was absolutely no improvement in the redness or texture of her skin. She's since started using an OTC face scrub by Pond's and her face looks better than it has in years.

I received this package quite quickly, and it was securely and nicely packaged considering that it was only a bottle of shampoo in the package :). The product on the otherhand does not smell like garlic, which is a good thing, but I've just started using the shampoo so I still have to wait and see if the product does what it says it does. Overall, good customer service and will buy again from this seller :D
When I opened the bottle, this looked a little like a brown and I am NOT a brown polish girl. Once I put it on, I was relieved and excited! Love this color!
Arrived fast. Barrel heats up great. Broke after the second time using it. Rubber comes off handle making it difficult to use. Disappointed.

This product is fine as far as quality. However the description is misleading- notice the box photo it crops off one end of the applicator so you can not see if it is one tip or double tip. If you are a good consumer you want to pay an appropriate price for a product. If these were double tipped it would be a good deal. They are not. I will not be buying this again.

It smells nice (just like you remember) but fades quickly and isn't worth it. I bought this for something cheap to wear to work but will go back to wearing Paco Rabanne's 1 Million (way stronger and better!). Spend the extra cash, trust me.

The lid is not secure and the rollers do not sit properly on the heating device so everything falls apart easily. The edges of the rollers get very hot so they are hard to handle.The unit does heat up quickly.

I did not receive the product pictured. I received a round jar that says Mary Kay and the right name but inside is a pink waxy substance that is HIGHLY FRAGRANCED. Mary Kay is known for no fragrance in their skin care products and no coloring. I just want my money back now!

Just bought this and it is a really good product for the price. It warms up quite fast and the overall quality is good. The only reason I did not give it 5 stars is because like other reviewers said, you have to be carefull since it does pull hair from time to time. Got my hair really nicely done in about 10 minutes. I have a LOT of hair and usually takes me around 30-40 minutes with just a blow dryer. Love the rounded edges. I looked everywhere for this feature and this was the only one I could found that had a reasonable price. Yes, the Kenta has roundes edges too, but not willing to pay $130 for a flat iron.
The scent was nice but my boyfriend complained that the scent was just entirely too light. I had to agree.

If you're balding then get this along with dermatend. In combination you get nice results just don't expect a miracle or something too natural. Guess it depends on your hair type and color. Tends to fade as day goes on so maybe hairspray will hold it place

When I purchased this about a month ago my skin was very dry with on & off flaking. I made one other change at the time I started using it - I quit using the hardwater at my house on my face and started using distilled bottled water. I think changing the water did more to fix the problem than using the serum, however when I slip and use tap water it does help releave the tightness. I also purchased the pomegranate lotion & enzyme mask a few weeks later. My T-zone started getting shiney and I started breaking out & getting clogged pores. I backed off to only using my Cetaphil cleanser and my skin seemed to clear up a bit after a week. I'm starting over again to try & figure out whether I need to return all of it or if I can use some of it. I should also mention I'm pregnant and hormones may have an impact, but I don't think that's the whole story. I'd say only purchase this if it's within your budget and make sure you can return it if it doesn't work.

I like the old line of mustella with ultimate hydration lotion much better ( it is discointinued )This new body lotion has a fragrant scent which I don't really care for ,because frankly I prefer very light scented lotions. It clashes with the perfume I wear.

I puchased both this and the matching conditioner. After two bottles of each, my hair started to feel heavy -- like I hand't rinsed it adequately, even though I know I had. I cancelled my auto ship order after two times.
item is shown as 6.7 OZ bottle and I received a tiny 1.7 OZ,seller is dishonest,I could have paid less for it if I wasn't fooled by the the picture and seller lies !

For 21 years I've struggled to keep my unruly wavy and frizzy hair under control. I can think of two times now I've been happy with it and one of those times was when I got my hair done with this serum. I usually put my hair up to avoid dealing with it, but I look much better with it down. This product makes my waves and curls come out without the frizz/poof and smells great. I can go out now confident with the way my hair looks down and my boyfriend has even commented on how good it looks. I don't even care how much it costs. I would pay much more for it and it lasts a long time. My mom brought me to her stylist because she has similar hair (where I got it from) and she did the same thing to me as she did to mom, only a little bit different of a style. Needless to say, we both swear by this product now. It's not for straight fine hair, and it really isn't for straightening either. For thick unruly hair, it's a godsend! Thanks, Paul Mitchell!

The shipping was fast.The packaging is really smooth and pretty.I really like the foggy (matte) effect when I first put it on, but it wears out pretty quickly and started chipping off little by little.The matte effect becomes unclear and shiny rather fast.I like this product in general, and it's not really expensive.
This texture balm leaves my hair very greasy and does not help with styling at all. Actually, does not deserve even one star :-)
BE is fun to wear. Just not everyday for me. My eyelids swell up. I do love the colors though.
The lipstick is rich in moisture and wears for a few hours. I have found, though, that the lipstick will not stay "out" during application. Instead it pushes back into the tube.

I ordered this for my daughter, who has long, very thick hair. After trying many different kinds of brushes and having only moderate success, I decided to take a chance on this one based on reviews. WHAT A BUY!!! She no longer complains when I brush her hair either wet or dry, and after a year it's still going strong! Don't look any further, this is the brush for anyone whose hair tends to knot and tangle!

I am very satisfied with the service I received from this company. I did get a defective product and they did promptly send me a new one. I am very grateful for that. They were very courteous and didn't even cause me any additional costs. They are very helpful and respond promptly. Thank you for being so prompt and kind in this matter.

This straightener is a lot better than the thin conair one i previously bought. It does heat up in 60 secs and is able tyo smoothe out my thick wavy hair. It's a good straightener for the price so i would recommended it. It's gold plated but not ceramic.

Mine came with a pump, but the exfoliant clumps and all I get is a watery-substance when I pump into my hand. The product definitely exfoliates well, that's why it gets 3 stars, but because I have sensitive skin I tend to break out if I use more than two times a week (which is why it doesn't get 5 stars). The exfoliation is definitely "micro" so you're not getting a bunch of big beads drooping down your face, and instead it stays put while you're doing your exfoliation. Overall, as far as exfoliation goes, this does a great, great job, with my face feeling very smooth afterward. Just a word of caution for those with sensitive skin, don't over-do it, and for all users out there, avoid the pump.

While the Red Door cologne's fragrance was lighter and more refreshing, the Red Door Eau De Parfum is too heavy and to me seems stale - not fresh like the cologne. I prefer something lighter, so won't buy this again.
Have been using for about a week. Haven't seen any difference. But at least it's not expensive. Like the package too.
looks very dark, not navy to my eyes. also i cant get it to crackle like it's supposed to, even after reading how to tips and trying several methods.
Now that I've installed this, I'm wondering what will happen if I ever need to remove it. One disappointment: There's no place for a toothbrush.
The eye gel is very light, but it is absorbed well. I don't feel too much difference after applying it though.

Let me start by saying I have healthy, light brown hair that I bleached to pale blonde, almost white. It managed to stay in great condition even after the bleach. After reading reviews, I saw that this was a good choice to tone for an awesome natural-looking medium blonde. I followed directions EXACTLY and even left the color on as long as indicated in the instructions. The result looked as if I did nothing at all! My hair looked the exact same shade as I began with.... white! I guess it's better than a horrible dark brown or black which people sometimes come up with after coloring bleached hair. However, I did a lot of studying before attempting this so that would not happen to me. My hair is still in good condition, but now I have to RE-COLOR again after bleaching, which I'm sure cannot be good for my hair (besides the embarrasement of walking through the store like this). I must assume that this was an individual defective product...as I've used this brand before with success. But I will be using Colorsilk in Medium Ash Blonde instead after reading even more reviews.**** UPDATE **** Colorsilk in Med Ash Blonde was perfect.... healthy & shiny too. Just the right shade of blonde (somewhere between medium ash blonde & dark blonde - but most importantly NO BRASS!!

I've been using a $1 fingernail clipper for about 5 years now and purchased this clipper to replace it. I first noticed the size of this clipper is slightly larger than an average clipper, but the advantages include a sharper clip, slick handle turning mechanism, and the aesthetically pleasing design. A fantastic product overall, but quite pricey compared to a $1 clipper.
GloMinerals products cost more but the quality is there. They have unusual colors that are not offered by other makeup lines.

Good price point, but I'm not sure it's doing what I need for my skin. It's quite moisturizing, pleasurable to apply, and has a nice if strong scent. My skin seems to be benefiting texturally. It looks a little more lush and velvety. I, however, need more help over all with my skin tone, redness in my cheeks and some sun and old acne spots. This product makes my skin look nice, but I am not at all amazed. The Olay Definity night creme gave better results with regards to my needs and it is only a few dollars more. I will probably always use some Olay products, but this one I think is not for me.

I ordered this polish for what the salon used to call an American Manicure, which is more pink than the traditional French Manicure. After the first coat of polish, it was streaked badly. The polish was so thick, I couldn't get a second coat on the nail. I kept adding polish thinner, quite a lot ultimately, to get it to a thinner texture. It still streaked after the first coat, as well as after a second coat. I put the polish away for a few days but decided to give it one more try before giving up. This time the polish didn't streak after one thin, carefully applied coat, which was exactly the color I wanted. With one coat and a good top coat, it is a very natural looking manicure.After a lot of frustration adding thinner again and again to get the right texture and some time letting the polish meld with the thinner, I have the color and texture of polish I wanted. I will use this bottle of polish as long as it does not start streaking again, but I'm unsure if I will purchase another bottle.
This fragrance is among my favorites. I always receive compliments when I wear it. It stays fresh and clean all day.

Pretty good scent but the handling of the product was horrible. The box was all dented and the top ripped. When i opened the box i found the cologne to be cracked but not leaking thankfully. Good scent but absolutely horrible shipping. Was not satisfied

I GOT THIS PRODUCT TO HELP HAIRGROWTH AND ALSO STOP HAIRLOSS AND IT WORKS!THE PRICE IS GREAT IF YOU COMPARE IT WITH OTHER SELLERS AND I GOT THE PRODUCT IN THREE DAYS!!.THIS SELLER REALLY KNOWS HOW TO TAKE CARE OF CUSTOMERS.

When this salt is used as a hand scrub it can sting your hands a little while it dries out your skin removing any impurities or dirt in your pores. It is nice however, in a diluted bath and water solution. I used about 1 cup in a hot bath and did not receive the incredibly smooth skin I was seeking. This dead sea salt did not moisturize my skin like the stuff in the mall. I guess it's my fault for being ignorant on what to expect but... oh well. You live you learn.I give it a 3 out of 5 because it's good as bath salt but probably on the cheaper side of quality...

I suspect these bands were exposed to UV or heat while in storage. Most broke immediately, the rest broke within 3 days of use. Plastic elastic braiding bands are meant to be hardy and long-lasting for binding the ends of braids. Instead, these broke more than four times more quickly than the ordinarily weaker black rubber bands I use as short-term "break-away" bands for the hair root. (And the black rubber bands I've been using are more than 10 years old). Extremely disappointing performance and not worth even the Amazon "add-on" price.

I bought this product last month, hoping to get rid of the acne on my upper arms and back. Well, it worked for about a week and a half or two weeks, and it cleared up my back and arms. However, it all came back, even though I hadn't stopped using the product. So I started mixing it with Dial antibacterial bodywash, and now the combination of the two works great! So overall, this is a good product, but it would be better if it were antibacterial.
I am using this product since about a month. I don't see significant changes, but yes my abdomen skin is better than it was immediately after delivery.
This is not the real product, and I would guess it's a bootleg. I did not open it as I wanted to return it, but the product and packaging are quite different from the one pictured.

Kiss My Face is one of the few brands of products that don't irritate my skin. I've been using their moisture soap for about five years now. However, I have only used the Pear scent up until I tried this Peach scent. The scent itself was pleasant but the soap was so much thinner (almost runny) compared to the Pear scent.

I love love love this company. However, as someone who uses soap and lotion in place of perfume/cologne, etc., when it comes to lotions, I'm about the scent as much as the lotion's hydrating qualities. The lavender lotion doesn't have as rich a lavender scent as EO Everyday Body Lotion/French Lavender. The EO lotion sells for about 1/3 the cost of the Mistral lotion (if you buy it here, via Amazon's Subscribe & Save program, but it's cheaper anywhere, really). The hydrating qualities are about the same, although the Mistral lotion does have a "richer" feel, going on. I'm just sharing this to help anyone else who really cares about the "scents" of lotions. I'm insane for the scent of Mistral's Wild Blackberry lotion, which, for some mysterious reason, has been discontinued, and also enjoy Mistral's South Seas scent.

Nioxin normally produces excellent products, but in this case, the Nioxin Intensive Therapy Deep Repair Masque did not meet my expectations for excellent conditioning qualities. The masque only softens hair and detangles, but doesn't add the body that I need in a repair masque. For the price of this product, it does not deliver!
My foot doctor wanted me to use this product. It seems to work OK.
This was a surprise gift for my husband who loves it but thought I paid a fortune for it. He was amazed at the price. I have one happy husband.
I guess I was expecting a different scent. This one is strong, which is a bonus and pleasant enough, but not very musky and more of a cinnamon/vanilla smell to me.
I've tried all kinds of dandruff shampoo and conditioners but this is the only thing that has ever worked on my dry scalp. Makes my hair really soft
Nize size, but the plastic on the plastic get hot and burn your fingers when you roll your hair.

I was excited when I read all of the reviews, and when I got it, the package is very european, I was excited to open the package. For some reason, this brush produces a lot of static when I brush dry hair (not the case with Fekkai's brush)...it does work beautifully after taking a shower, but is 100 bucks worth it? I'm not sure...I'm keeping the brush and to tell you the truth my hair looks ok but I don't think a brush is an investment, it is a cost, if you have the money, splurge, if not, you will be fine without it...

I bought this because I really liked the Bijan Black, but I wanted something slightly different... it smells really good.... and now I use it even more than the Black. All my co-workers like it, and some even bought it for themselves!

I liked the Aussie hair spray well enough -- it did hold my style without being too sticky or stiff, but I found the smell to be a little overpowering. At first, it has a fruity smell -- but you can still smell it hours later and it doesn't work well if you're wearing a perfume. I think I'd opt to purchase this spray with an unscented smell. Overall, the hair spray was good for the price.

OK....witch hazel is a simple, ages-old product that does a great job, all by itself.........NO NEED to have it all 'gussied up' with those added ingredients!!Just look for standard, USP witch hazel instead, and save your money!!

Conair 1875 hair dryerstopped working in less than a month. The reset button won't click, so it won't start. Don't feel like the hassle of trying for a credit or return, don't have packaging. Am going to buy local where I can easily return something.

This was a very good product. It came wrapped well. The product itself I love to take with me in my purse so that I can smell nice any where, any time of day. Beautiful perfume is so great, because it smells lovely and is a sweet reminder that makes you feel good when you where it. I just love it and give it five stars for value, and good packing and easy to use.

Pros- its light weight, does what it says, dries my wet (thin but dense) hair and straigtens. It is a pretty contraption and it has adjustable heat which is nice.Cons- my Hair gets caught in the frame of it and pulled out which is both painful and frustrating. And it happens so frequently and it is such a big deal that if i had the money i would go ahead and pass it to my little sister and buy a new one.I do not have said money and it doesss do what it is supposed to so for now i can continue to use it and thats why it got a 2 instead of a 1.
I bought three of these in September 07. They all had an expiration date of April 07.
I absolutley love this product. My hair is fairly straight already, but it works great to smooth my hair. I also like how you can use it to curl your hair.
This is okay but the other KMF shower gels are better: Silky Soft, Early to Bed, and Early to Rise are my personal faves.

This curling iron is bulky and hard to handle. I bought it because of the ceramic tourmaline finish thinking it would leave my hair silky like my ceramic flat iron does. This product made my hair really dry. I only used it twice but probably won't use it again.
This smelled wonderful but did not clean me at all. I ended up just using it to clean my bath tub after I took a bath. I would not buy this again!

Cons the cord is quite short and you can't use an extension cord. The cool heat setting is warmish too.Pros if you don't use the highest heat setting at all this is a very good dryer if not better, excluding it's thormaline lack. The cool setting is about warm the warm is hot and the high hot is steaming and after about a minute smells like somethings burning. I have found that to be true for any ceramic not thormaline dryer I have tested/tried on high settings particularly on high speeds. I didn't use the hot but I did turn on the highest hot setting for a couple minutes for this review. The bottons aren't the easiest to turn on and off but there not that bad either. I highly don't recommend using the high heat not only for your hair but because it harms your skin also even if you can't see/feel the skin damage.There is a fairly unique accessory that could be good but I'm not certain of it's usefulness- it is the hair straightner, smoothining one.It is certainly lightweight, but if you can afford to spend $8. more I'd recommend the RevlonRv544 with free shipping on here or any other thourmaline dryer. This conair dryer used as I mentioned shouldn't damage your hair (Unlike cheap non ceramic dryers that will. Thourmaline in my mind is a higher quality ceramic) but it won't give you added benifit or make your hair healthier like Thourmaline is proven to do.P.S. If your interested the number 1 reason I bought this is for it's three heat settings and overall value as a backup 2nd dryer. My first dryer I still use as my main one I love the 3 heat settings rarily if ever using the high heat for my normal long hair and sensitive skin and scalp. My first one is Thourmaline and better and I was okay with that staying that way. I returned this because of it's cord length mostly. But, I wouldn't be surprised at all if conairs strength doesn't rely in there hair dryers. My other dryer is from Remington but not lightweight unfortunatly.

I have heard so much about Carol's Daughter's products and I had been wanting to try something from the line. I am African American and I do hair professionally. I have very long thick hair that constantly needs moisture. I want to address the smell : It is very VERY bold. It is not so much unpleasant as it is loud. If I were sensitive to smells I'd definitely have a problem with this product. I would apply it on a weekend so that it would calm down before returning to work. It doesn't really do a whole lot for my hair unless my hair is wet and the instructions is for it to be applied to the scalp---but I don't like clogging my scalp with ointments. It works really well on my daughter's hair and her hair is finer and a smoother texture than mine. I don't really see the benefit for people with TRULY "nappy" hair to use this. I will probably continue to buy for my children and for me to use after a shampoo.
Was not pleased with color. Hard to tell real color on screen. Oh well, I'll use them sometimes.

Before you buy this, I highly recommend you do some research on its active ingredient, hydroquinone. Although the FDA claims there is insufficent evidence to link hydroquinone to cancer, Japan, the European Union, and Australia have already banned it from their products.Just be safe, and make an educated descision.
This was fairly ineffective. I applied this as prescribed. Saw no results and ended up throwing out the bottle.Be happy with your skin or skin tone.
This is a great product, but the delivery service failed. Luckily DHL is no longer in service, so it should not be a problem.

The product does make your hair feel better, but there isn't enough in one bottle to do the job. I have short (2" - 3") hair, and one bottle did not cover my hair. The design of the nozzle is terrible. The product is the thickness of a thin gruel and won't flow through the nozzle. I had to cut the nozzle half-off to get it to go through. As per the instructions, you put it on damp, towel dried hair, and one person can't get it to go on evenly. I missed spots. Since your hair is already damp, you can't tell where you put the product (also, since you have plastic gloves on, you can't feel it either). It is expensive for what you get. Unless you have a very, very short hair, one bottle isn't enough. Manufacturers: change the consistency to a thicker paste and put in a tube like toothpaste,so that you can squeeze it all in a plastic applicator to you can add water to it to make a more liquid product. As is it, doesn't cover your entire hair. It has is a pleasant, non-henna smell, and didn't make my head itch. Redesign the bottle, make the product "runnier", and it will be OK.

I've been all over when it comes to colognes. Ranging from the regular Hugo Boss, Calvin Klein, Tommy, and various Avon types that my Mother has gotten as demo's and/or very cheap being a rep. Each of the above brands I have tried varying types from each and many more that I cannot name at the moment.Anyways, to the thoughts on the actual product... It has a very pleasant that reminds me a lot of cinnamon. I can best describe its power by using this analogy, say you spray a very heavy dose of 5 sprays. Now with other colognes your going to be asked to leave the room, with this cologne its more potent but not as offensive. For example, say someone lights 5 candles vs spraying 5 cans of aerosol air freshener.If your looking for something that everyone in your office will know what your wearing when you pull into the parking lot then this isn't your fragrance. If on the other want it to be noticeable when you sit down by the people beside you then this is your fragrance. I would consider this a much sweeter and milder version of the regular Hugo by Hugo Boss that is so popular. Another similar but slightly spicier smelling cologne you may wish to consider if you like this is Lacoste Pour Homme By Lacoste. Another favorite of mine in my picky collection.Hope this helps!

These rollers are the perfect size/amount. Two issues, the rollers do not heat up in one minute like advertised, takes around 3 - 4 minutes. They also are extremely hot to the touch but do not burn your head once in. Curl very well.

I can't say enough positive things about Plantlife soaps.I came to natural soaps for a very specific reason--a husband whose eczema was virtually out of control. For years, we'd tried keeping him on soaps designed for sensitive skin. While this would generally calm flare-ups slightly, it wouldn't prevent them from creeping up again. Admittedly, since beginning to use Plantlife's soaps, my husband is NOT eczema free... BUT his skin is drastically improved and his flare-ups are down to about 10% of what they once were.The scents of Plantlife's soaps are remarkably pleasant too. I've yet to find one that is offensive to my nose--they're delicately done, not over-powering or too "perfume-y."So if you're thinking of switching to herbal soaps to treat your skin to the best, most natural clean possible--try some Plantlife soaps. If you're simply looking for some aromatherapy or some way to mix-up your usual soap routine--try some Plantlife soaps. I'd be willing to bet that if you returned to "normal," store-bought soaps afterwards, you'd do so grudgingly and reluctantly!

Shipment was very quick, packed very well in the box.First, the bottle is not the best container for this particular oil, don't leak but when pour outside get oily.Second, not easy to be absorbed by the skin sits on skin for long time. The most important thing is that make my eyes irritated. At the beginning I was thinking that somehow I have some in the eyes, last night I just massage my cheeks with the oil and my eyes start burning, same as before. Now I have to use it only for my hands and body, no face.

I have had this dryer a few years now and I rarely use it due to its poor performance. It only has holes at the top of the hat so the air is only released at the top of your head and it does not dry the back and lower sides of your hair properly. You have to keep turning and twisting your head to get some of the air to blow on each quadrant of your head. The adjustable length is not very practical and you have to be creative about where you put the dryer and the chair you use in order to sit under the it comfortably. Do not buy this product!

I have worn Provocative perfume for several years and was sorry that I can no longer find it in the stores. I did order some from Amazon last year with no problem. What I received this year was NOT Provocative. Same bottle, same box, different content. The Provoative I have been using is clear...This is amber. This fragrance is mild, though not offensive...but it is not Provocative. Who knows what I really received. I would send it back but it is too much trouble. I am disappointed!
The title says its Burberry for Women --- but my wife handed back to me Christmas morning with a smirk - Thanks Amazon.....J

Eucerin sensitive skin face lotion with SPF 30 protection is a great product. However, it is extremely difficult to find in local stores (Rochester NY)---thus the reason for ordering it on-line and having to pay substantial postage. This lack of local availability is causing me to explore other substitute products. Although most other Eucerin products seem to be available, this is not the case for this 4 fluid ounce face lotion. If the situation remains unchanged, I will no longer be a customer.

This is Ravish Me Red by Revlon Super Lustrous, #654. It has a beautiful package and looks a gorgeous and vibrant red; HOWEVER, my daughter has olive undertones and I have blue undertones and this was just about the worst color either of us have ever tried on...appeared VERY ORANGE ON~! Now, regarding the product as a whole: It goes on silky smooth and is very blendable. There is a lot of product here for the money and the lipstick did NOT bleed into the skin around my mouth. It may have come off a little too easy; you would definitely have to reapply it if you eat or drink anything. So, I would strongly suggest that you try the color before buying if possible and know what the undertones are in YOUR skin before buying!
The title says its Burberry for Women --- but my wife handed back to me Christmas morning with a smirk - Thanks Amazon.....J

it was not bad but just soso. the texture was ok but not keeping my skin mostrized over hours. it smells very artificial. wont buy again.

I bought this hair I was shocked when I got the hair because the color was really off I thought I ordered dark hair but it was kind of reddish or Oberon hope I spelled that right I have never tried color but took a chance it turned out okay but I think the color chart needs to be changed because the picture looks like dark hair and it was totally off wouldn't mind buying more but afraid that it will be the wrong color I did get it really fast so Thanks Amazon 3 stars are for color mistake

This product is great I use it every day avidly. I thought I'd go online and save a few bucks....BAD IDEA!!! This seller took FOREVER to get it to my home. I was about to go and buy it at the store... I can't believe how long I waited for two lil bottles of sunblock. Next time I will not hesitate walking into Target and paying a few extra dollars.
